texts.fr: Le groupe OSSE-NI est formé de trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Aïssatou, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Aïssatou est âgée de 33 ans et est mariée à un revendeur du nom de Gafari. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Aïssatou n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Il y a trois ans, Aïssatou mène comme activité la vente de pièces détachées dans une ville du Bénin. Aïssatou achète ses produits au Bénin. Dans le but d’augmenter le stock de ses produits et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Aïssatou sollicite pour la première fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe OSSE-NI.
texts.en:
The OSSE-NI group is made up of three people who live in the same neighbourhood. The group representative, called Aïssatou, has her hand raised in the photo. This is the first time the group are seeking financial assistance from ALIDÉ, in order to increase the scale of their business. Aïssatou is 33 years old and is married to a retailer called Gafari. They have three children, all living at home and in school. Aïssatou did not go to school. 
For the last three years, Aïssatou has carried out the trade of selling spare parts in a city in Benin. Aïssatou buys her products in Benin. With a view to increasing her stock of products, and better meeting the needs of her customers, Aïssatou is seeking a loan from ALIDé for the first time, together with the other members of the OSSE-NI group.

loans.use: to buy spare parts

loans.name: Ama Gladys

texts.en: Ama Gladys operates a chop bar (a place where a variety of African food is sold) at Ayensudo near Elmina. In the picture above, she is pounding fufu. She cooks food like banku, fufu, rice bolls and other dishes.   She is married and has three children. She wants to expand her business.  This loan from Kiva will be invested into her cooking business for further expansion.

loans.use: invest in her food business

loans.name: Luis Bernardo

texts.es:
Luis Bernardo tiene 25 años vive en casado, vive con la esposa y un hijo, de un año. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Luis Bernardo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace tres años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicita para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es comprar un terreno y ayudar al hijo en el estudio.

Le gusta hacer deporte con el hijo y con los vecinos del barrio.
texts.en:
Luis Bernardo is 25 years old and married. He lives with his wife and one-year-old son in the San Temistocles precinct of the Ventanas canton.

The communal bank “Narcisa de Jesus," or “Daffodil of Jesus” is located in the San Temistocles precint, belonging to the Vantanas canton. This communal bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice. 

Luis Bernardo is a farmer and has been growing corn for three years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and then sells his goods at a market in the same area.  

Luis Bernardo is requesting the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for sowing corn. The loan has helped him increase his income, which goes towards his family’s consumptions and towards investment. His dream is to purchase a plot of land and help his son get an education.

He likes to play sports with his son and people from the neighborhood.

loans.use: purchase seeds and fertilizer to sow corn

loans.name: Ela Carmela

texts.es:
Ela es una mujer de 27, soltera, que se dedica a la preparación y venta de tortas, bocaditos, entre otros, esta actividad la desarrolla desde hace más de 8 años, junto a su madre y a su hermana, a través del tiempo ha demostrado mucho interés en continuar mejorando el servicio en su trabajo, es por ello que actualmente también realiza decoraciones en los eventos donde vende sus tortas. Gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación ella puede llegar a ganar hasta S/.64 diarios, lo que le permite cubrir todos los gastos que debe afrontar mensualmente, como la preparación de las tortas y gastos personales.

Ella se dedica también a atender la bodega de su madre junto a su hermana, lo que les permite un ingreso extra a ambas. “Un recuerdo que tengo es cuando prepare junto a mi hermana una torta de 3 pisos, cubierta de masa elástica, y por accidente se nos cayó, tuvimos que arreglarla en ese momento, afortunadamente todo salió bien” comenta Ela entre risas.

Gracias a los prestatarios Kiva Ela podrá tener mayor cantidad de dinero, lo que la ayudará a poder comprar algunos materiales que le son necesarios. Con esfuerzo y dedicación ella llegará a su meta, brindar el servicio de alquiler de mesas, sillas, manteles y una mejor decoración donde venda sus tortas y bocaditos, lo que le permitirá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ela is a single woman who is 27 years of age. She has been preparing and selling cakes, snacks, and other foods for more than eight years alongside her mother and sister. Over time, Ela has demonstrated great interest in improving the service she provides in her business. For this reason, she currently makes decorations for events in addition to selling cakes. Thanks to her effort and dedication, Ela has been able to earn 64 PEN each day, which enables her to cover her monthly expenses. This includes preparing cakes and her personal expenses.

Ela also manages a grocery store with her mother and sister, which enables them to earn extra income. “One memory I have is when my sister and I prepared a cake with three layers and covered it with icing. The cake fell down by accident and we had to repair it at that moment. Fortunately, everything ended well,” recalls Ela with a laugh.

Thanks to the Kiva lenders, Ela will be able to access more money to help her buy some necessary supplies. As a result of her effort and dedication, she will be able to reach her goal. Ela will provide rental services that offer tables, chairs, tablecloths, and major decorations from the same shop where she sells cakes and snacks. This will enable her have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy baking and decorating supplies.

loans.name: Etienne

texts.en: Etienne is married with seven children. He is 45 years old. All of his children attend school. He sells spare parts for bicycles. He has been running this business for the period of one and a half years selling the bicycle spare parts but in addition for the time he started the business of both motorcycle and bicycles is now about five years. He requested the loan to add more spare parts to sell. He plans to use the profits to expand his business building. In the future, he wishes to sell more spare parts.

loans.use: To buy more spare parts for sell.

loans.name: Delphine

texts.en: Delphine is 22 years old. She is married, with 4 children. She sells different items in her store for which she has been running for the period of 3 years. All profits go to schooling her children. She wants the loan to add more merchandise like rice, sugar and cooking oil. She expects to use the profits from this business to set up a wholesale shop to supply the small business people. In the future, she expects to be the major supplier.

loans.use: to buy some items for her shop

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is 41 years old. She is a widow with 5 children, ages between 2 and 23 years. One child goes to school. 

Beatrice sells beans and bananas and has done so for the last 3 years. She wants the loan to buy more beans and bananas to sell. With the profits she will manage to build her house to reside in.

loans.use: to buy more beans and bananas for sale

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.en:
Clotilde, 27, is married with two children; none of them go to school because they are still young. 

Clotilde owns a bar, which she has started recently and she hopes to be the very best business in the future. She has requested the loan to buy more beers to sell. With the profits from the business, she plans to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more beers to sell

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace cooks plain rice and serves it with tomato sauce, macaroni, fried fish and hot pepper sauce (shito) at Ayensudo, near Elmina, which she has done for 15 years. She is a widow. As a single parent, Grace is responsible for clothing, feeding and paying her children’s school fees and other household expenses. Grace will use the loan to purchase rice, tomatoes, cooking oil and so on. She anticipates reinvesting the new profit.

loans.use: to purchase rice, tomatoes and cooking oil

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is 35 years old. She is married with 4 children; they all go to school. With the loan, Agnes will buy more soap, rice, sugar, and maize flour. She has been running her business for the period of one year and half. With the expected profits, Agnes wants to buy a motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy items to fill her store

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
A sus 14 años, Carlos Alberto es un joven emprendedor que desde pequeño aprendió las labores propias de las ventas al lado de su padre con quien vendía diferentes productos en las calles del municipio de la Ceja al Oriente de Antioquia. 

Con la esperanza de progresar y tener una mejor calidad de vida, este joven emprendedor inició hace poco con su negocio de venta de productos de salud y belleza los cuales espera que se conviertan en el inicio de su gran sueño tener su propio almacén. 

Actualmente necesita de un préstamo para comprar productos propios de su negocio que le permitan ofrecerle a sus clientes mayor variedad y así incrementar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
At 14 years of age, Carlos Alberto is a young entrepreneur who learned how to work on his own. Along with his father, he sells different products as a street vendor in the town of La Ceja, which is east of Antioquia.

With expectations of making progress and having a better quality of life, this young entrepreneur recently launched his own business selling health and beauty products. He expects to fulfill his dream of converting this venture into his own store.

Carlos currently needs a loan to buy products for his business, which will enable him to offer his customers a wide variety and to generate profits.

loans.use: to buy health and beauty products.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en: Vestine is 29 years old. She has 2 children, 4 and 8 years old. Vestine has sold foodstuffs for more than one year. She is requesting the loan to buy more foodstuffs to sell. She expects to use the profits to renovate the house.

loans.use: to buy more foodstuffs to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a variety of fruits to sell

loans.name: Angelique

texts.en: Angelique is 29 years old. She is married with three children, ages between 1 and 4; none of them have attended school yet. Angelique has been running a business of selling maize flour and rice for 6 years. She has requested the loan to buy more maize flour and rice for sale. With the profits, Angelique will buy a motorcycle for transportation and it will be another source of generating income. She would love to become a wholesaler in the future.

loans.use: to buy more maize flour and rice for sale

loans.name: Angelique

texts.en: Angelique is 26 years old. She sells beer and sodas and she has been running this business for the past 4 years. She wants the loan to increase the inventory in her pub. With the profits, she wants to reinvest in the business. She would like to become the sole distributor of the drinks in the future.

loans.use: To buy more beer and sodas to sell.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice, age 47, is married to a businessman. She has 3 children between 26 and 29 years old. She sells a local soft juice made from sorghum. With the loan she will buy more sorghum for making juice. She plans to use the profits from the business to make some savings and buy a domestic animal to raise. She dreams of having a large stock of sorghum in the future.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum for making juice.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
José Manuel tiene 39 años es viudo, vive con los hijos, de 20, 15, 13 , 10 y 5 años. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

José Manuel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace seis años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es comprar un solar para construir la casa.

En los tiempos libres le gusta descansar y conversar con los hijos.
texts.en:
José Manuel is 39 years old, a widower, and lives with his children (ages 20, 15, 13, 10, and 5) in the neighborhood of San Temistocles in the canton of Ventanas.

The Communal Bank “Narcisa de Jesus” is located in the neighborhood of San Temistocles, which is in the canton of Ventanas. This group consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

José Manuel is a farmer who has been growing corn for six years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his products at the market in the same place. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn. This will be a great help with increasing his income for the consumer needs of his family and for investment. His dream is to buy a solar panel system so that he can build a house.

In his free time, he enjoys relaxing and conversing with his children.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en: Vestine is 30 years old. She has 5 children between 9 months and 8 years old. Two of them go to school. She has spent 4 years in the business of selling clothes and radios. The loan will be used to add more clothes and radios to her store. From the profits, she hopes to reinvest in the same business.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and radios for resale.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine is 29 years old. She is married to a businessman. They have three children between the ages of 1 and 11 years. Only one child goes to school. She has been selling salt and charcoal for 2 years. She has requested the loan to buy more salt and charcoal for selling. In the future, she would like to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: To buy more salt and charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fish and bags of rice and beans for waakye preparation.

loans.name: Maria Luz

texts.es:
Maria Luz   tiene 32 años es soltera, vive con los hijos  de 17, 11 y 7 años. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Maria Luz se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace tres años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es comprar un terreno para construir una casa.

En los tiempos libres le gusta mucho ver la televisión.
texts.en:
Maria Luz is 32 years old, single, and lives with her children (ages 17, 11, and 7) in the neighborhood of San Temistocles in the canton of Ventanas.

The Communal Bank “Narcisa de Jesus” is located in the neighborhood of San Temistocles, which is in the canton of Ventanas. This group consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Maria Luz is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for three years. She buys her supplies in Ventanas and sells her products at the market in the same place. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. This will be a great help with increasing her income for the consumer needs of her family and for investment. Her dream is to buy a plot of land so that she can build a house.

In her free time, Maria Luz enjoys watching television.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loans.name: Abigail

texts.en: On the table seen above, Abigail has some pineapples and watermelons displayed. She sells different kinds of fruits at Ayensudu near Elmina.  She is married and has 3 children. She assists her husband in the general upkeep of the home. Her loan will be used to buy other kinds of fruits to sell. She hopes to use the new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy other kinds of fruit to sell.

loans.name: Maria Cleofe

texts.es:
María Cleofe  tiene 33 años es Viuda, vive con la hija. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Maria  Cleofe  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es comprar una casa.

En los tiempos libres le gusta descansar.
texts.en:
María Cleofe is 33 years old, widowed, and lives with her daughter in the neighborhood of San Temistocles in the canton of Ventanas.

The Communal Bank “Narcisa de Jesus” is located in the neighborhood of San Temistocles, which is in the canton of Ventanas.  This group consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.  

Maria Cleofe is a farmer who grows corn.  She buys her supplies in Ventanas and sells her products at the market in the same place.  The loan she is requesting will be used to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.  This will be a great help with increasing her income for the consumer needs of her family and for investment.  Her dream is to buy a house.  

In her free time, Maria Cleofe enjoys relaxing.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loans.name: E-Koue Group

texts.fr: Le groupe E-KOUE est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans un même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Ayoko Sèna, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier d’ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Ayoko Sèna est âgée de 33 ans et est mariée à un certain Cyprien. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Ayoko Sèna a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Ayoko Sèna vend de la nourriture (riz, pâte de maïs et de la sauce) à son domicile, ce qui lui permet de faire face à ses différentes charges. Ayoko Sèna achète ses produits dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but d’augmenter le stock de ses produits et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Ayoko Sèna désire obtenir un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe E-KOUE .
texts.en:
The E-KOUE group is made up of three people who live in the same neighbourhood. The group representative, called Ayoko Sèna, has her hand raised in the photograph. This is the first time that this group is seeking financial assistance from ALIDé, with the objective of scaling up their business. Ayoko Sèna is 33 years old and married to someone called Cyprien. The couple have four children living at home, some of whom attend school. Ayoko Sèna stopped school at the secondary level.
For twenty five years, Ayoko Sèna has sold food (rice, cornmeal and sauce) from her home. Ayoko Sèna buys her products in a market in Benin. In the hope of increasing her stock of products and better meeting her customers' needs, Ayoko Sèna is seeking a first loan with ALIDé, together with the other members of the E-KOUE group.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice, corn and condiments for sauce.

loans.name: Kossi

texts.fr:
Kossi est un homme âgé de 47 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a 5 enfants qui vont tous à l’école. Le premier a 21 ans et le dernier a 13 ans.
Kossi travaille comme revendeur depuis 2007. Il vend des plats, des verres à boire et des palettes de boissons pour tous clients dans sa boutique. Il achète les produits à Lomé. Il travaille seul. Au moment, n’a pas de difficultés.
Kossi a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des plats, des verres à boire et des palettes de boissons. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Kossi voudrait agrandir la taille de l’activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit d’assurer les besoins élémentaires de sa famille.
texts.en: Kossi is a 47 year old man.  He is married to a retailer.  He has 5 children who all attend school. The oldest is 21 years old and the youngest is 13 years old.  Kossi has worked as a retailer since 2007.  He sells plates, drinking glasses, and pallets of drinks for all types of customers in his store.  He buys the products in Lome.  He works alone.  At the moment, he does not have any problems.  Kossi is asking for his 3rd loan with WAGES in order to buy plates, drinking glasses, and pallets of beverages.  He wants to reinvest in his business.  In the coming years, Kossi would like to expand the size of his business.  He says that with the profits he plans to take care of the basic needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy glasses, plates, and other items.

loans.name: Leibnitz Marcelo

texts.es:
Leibnitz Marcelo tiene 36 años es casado, vive con la esposa y con las hijas  de 11 y 4  años. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Marcelo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 8 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando.

En los tiempos libres disfruta mucho hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Leibnitz Marcelo is 36 years old, married, and lives with his wife and two daughters (ages 11 and 4) in the neighborhood of San Temistocles in the canton of Ventanas.

The Communal Bank “Narcisa de Jesus” is located in the neighborhood of San Temistocles, which is in the canton of Ventanas.  This group consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.  

Marcelo is a farmer who has been growing corn for eight years.  He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his products at the market in the same place.  The loan he is requesting will be used to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.  This will be a great help with increasing his income for the consumer needs of his family and for investment.  His dream is to buy a plot of land so that he can continue planting.  

In his free time, he enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for planting corn and rice.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more food to sell.

loans.name: Hamilton Darwin

texts.es:
Hamilton Darwin tiene 19 años es soltero, vive con los padres no tiene hijos. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Hamilton  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 3 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es comprar una casa.
Le gusta ver televisión y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Hamilton Darwin is 19 years old, single, and has no children. He lives with his parents in the neighborhood of San Temistocles in the canton of Ventanas.

The Communal Bank “Narcisa de Jesus” is located in the neighborhood of San Temistocles, which is in the canton of Ventanas. This group consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Hamilton is a farmer who has been growing corn for three years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his products at the market in the same place. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. This will be a great help with increasing his income for the consumer needs of his family and for investment. His dream is to buy a house.

In his free time, he enjoys watching television and playing sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en: On the tables seen above, Linda has some pineapples and oranges. She sells different kinds of fruits at Ayensudu near Elmina.  She is married and has 3 children. She assists her husband in the general upkeep of the home. Her loan will be used to buy other kinds of fruit to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to buy land.

loans.use: to buy other kinds of fruit to sell.

loans.name: Maria Rosmira

texts.es: La señora Maria Rosmira es dueña desde hace un año de una pequeña tienda adecuada en su casa, debido a las limitaciones de salud de la señora Maria Rosmira quien no puede realizar labores fuertes, ella se dedica sólo a la parte administrativa de la tienda y las demás funciones las realiza su esposo quien la apoya incondicionalmente. Con la esperanza de mejorar su surtido y sus ventas, la señora Maria necesita de la compra de diferentes productos tales como gaseosas, snacks, licor y abarrotes, soñando con mejorar sus ingresos y así ampliar su negocio y la calidad de vida de su esposo y dos hijos.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria Rosmira has been the owner of a small store in her home for the past year. Due to health limitations, she is not able to engage in heavy labor. Maria only handles the administrative functions of her store and leaves the rest to her husband who supports her unconditionally.

Hoping to improve her inventory and sales, Sra. Maria needs to buy different products such as sodas, snacks, liquor, and groceries. She dreams of improving her income, expanding her business, and improving the quality of life for her husband and two children.

loans.use: to buy sodas, snacks, liquor, and groceries.

loans.name: Legne Maricel

texts.es:
Legne Maricel tiene 22 años es casada, vive con el esposo y con los  hijos de 4 y 1 año. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Legne  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 2 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es tener un terreno.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Legne Maricel is 22 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children (ages 4 and 1) in the neighborhood of San Temistocles in the canton of Ventanas.

The Communal Bank “Narcisa de Jesus” is located in the neighborhood of San Temistocles, which is in the canton of Ventanas. This group consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Legne is a farmer who has been growing corn for two years. She buys her supplies in Ventanas and sells her products at the market in the same place. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. This will be a great help with increasing her income for the consumer needs of her family and for investment. Her dream is to buy a plot of land.

She enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more dried cassava fish for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chicks

loans.name: Edwin Mariano

texts.es:
Edwin Mariano tiene 30 años es casado, vive con la esposa y con el  hijo de 5 año. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Edwin Mariano  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 2 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  comprar un terreno para seguir invirtiendo.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Edwin Mariano is 30 years old, married, and lives with his wife and five-year-old son in the neighborhood of San Temistocles in the canton of Ventanas.

The Communal Bank “Narcisa de Jesus” is located in the neighborhood of San Temistocles, which is in the canton of Ventanas. This group consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Edwin Mariano is a farmer who has been growing corn for two years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his products at the market in the same place. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. This will be a great help with increasing his income for the consumer needs of his family and for investment. His dream is to buy a plot of land so that he can continue investing.

He enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary has been a baker at Ayensudu near Elmina for 4 years now. She is a single parent with 4 children.  As a single parent she feeds, clothes and pays the school fees of her children with her income. Mary needs this loan to purchase bags of flour, sugar and oil for her bakery. With the new profits, Mary would like to give her children the best education.

loans.use: purchase bags of flour, sugar and oil for her bakery.

loans.name: Susana Marlene

texts.es:
Susana Marlene tiene 25 años es casada, vive con el esposo y con los  hijos de 9 y 8 año. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Susana Marlene  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 2 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  comprar un terreno y un vehículo.
Le gusta ir de paseo.
texts.en:
Susana Marlene is 25 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and her children who are 9 and 8 years old.  She lives in San Temistocles, in Ventanas canton.

The Narcisa de Jesus community bank is located in San Temistocles, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Susana Marlene is a farmer who has been growing corn for two years.  She buys her products in Ventanas and sells them in the market in the same place.

Susana Marlene will use the loan that she requested to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.  The loan will help her to increase her income which means she will be able to help her family and invest.  Her dream is to buy a plot of land and a vehicle.

Susana Marelene enjoys going out for walks.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice

loans.name: Delia Emerita

texts.es:
Delia  tiene 20 años vive en unión libre, vive con el compañero  y con el hijo de 1 año. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Delia  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 2 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  comprar un terreno.
Le gusta descansar.
texts.en:
Delia is 20 years old.  She lives with her partner and her one-year-old son in San Temistocles, in Ventanas canton.

The Narcisa de Jesus community bank is located in San Temistocles, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Delia is a farmer who has been growing corn for two years.  She buys her products in Ventanas and sells them in the market in the same place.

Delia will use the loan that she requested to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.  The loan will help her to increase her income which means she will be able to help her family and invest.  Her dream is to buy a plot of land.

In her free time, Delia likes to rest.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
Luzmila tiene 53 años es casada, vive con el esposo  y con 5 hijos. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.
Luzmila  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 2 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  tener una casa.
Le gusta descansar y pasear por el campo.
texts.en:
Luzmila is 53 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband and five children.  She lives in San Temistocles, in Ventanas canton.

The Narcisa de Jesus community bank is located in San Temistocles, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Luzmila is a farmer who has been growing corn for two years.  She buys her products in Ventanas and sells them in the market in the same place.

Luzmila will use the loan that she requested to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.  The loan will help her to increase her income which means she will be able to help her family and invest.  Her dream is to own her own home.

In her free time, Luzmila enjoys resting and walking in the countryside.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar, de 28 años, es un joven trabajador, amable y bueno, es soltero y no tiene hijos, es por eso que vive en casa alquilada y trabaja mucho todos los días para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Edgar consiste en el transporte de pasajeros de manera colectivo dentro y fuera de la ciudad. Pasa sus días manejando su taxi, no importa si es de día o de noche, él sigue recorriendo las calles en busca de clientes que deseen llegar sanos y seguros a su destino. Su animo alegre y sus dotes de conversador hacen que los clientes lo busquen para que les haga una carrera, además que conoce muy bien las calles de la ciudad de Pucallpa y siempre brinda un servicio rápido, al principio le fue complicado ya que le era pesado tener que manejar tanto, pero cuando empezó a ver lo rentable que le era y acoplarse al ritmo, logró consolidarse.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es pasear por las calles, ya que se distrae mucho, lleva 2 años realizando este trabajo y lo que menos le gusta es tener que lidiar con algunos pasajeros que no pagan su pasaje. Espera más adelante comprar otro taxi y hacerlo trabajar para mejorar sus ingresos. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por tanto esta muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su negocio, además está muy comprometido con el pago de sus cuotas como en el anterior crédito que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará algunas piezas y materiales para refaccionar su vehículo, además de renovar su documentación que está a punto de caducar.
texts.en:
28-year-old Edgar is a hard-working, friendly young man.  He is single and doesn't have any children.  For this reason, he lives in a rental house and works a lot every day so that he can enjoy a better quality of life.  Edgar's job is providing a collective passenger transport service both within the city and outside the city.  He spends his days driving his taxi, working either days or nights.  He drives the streets in search of customers who want to arrive at their destination safe and sound.  He is a cheerful man and his talents as a conversationalist mean that his customers seek him out so that he can give them a ride.  In addition, he knows the streets of the city of Pucallpa very well and always provides a quick service.  At first things were complicated as it was difficult having to drive so much.  However, when he started to see how profitable it was and he got into a rhythm, he managed to grow in his business.

What Edgar most likes about his work is driving through the streets as he really enjoys himself.  He has been in this line of work for two years and what he least likes about it is having to argue with some passengers who don't pay their fare.  He hopes, in the future, to buy another taxi and to work with it so that he can improve his income.  

This will be Edgar's second loan from MFP and he is very happy to know that he will have financial support.  This makes him feel certain that he can make progress with his business.  He pledges faithfully that he will make his loan repayments on time as he did with his previous loan.  Edgar will use the loan for 1,000 soles that he has requested to buy some spare parts and materials for his vehicle.  He will also renew his documentation [driver's license] which is about to expire.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his car and to renew his driver's license

loans.name: Hounkpo-Nou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe HOUNKPO-NOU est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Sofiatou Abiodoun, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier d’ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Sofiatou Abiodoun est âgée de 44 ans et est mariée à un certain Laurent. Le couple a un enfant, scolarisé et à leur charge. Sofiatou Abiodoun a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Il y a quinze ans, Sofiatou Abiodoun vend de divers produits (conserves, savons, sucre, etc.). Ce qui lui permet de subvenir aux besoins de son enfant. Sofiatou Abiodoun achète ses produits dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Sofiatou Abiodoun désire obtenir un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe HOUNKPO-NOU.
texts.en: The HOUNKPO-NOU group comprises three people who live in the same neighbourhood. The group representative, called Sofiatou Abiodoun, has her hand raised in the photo. This is the first time this group is seeking financial assistance from ALIDé in order to increase the scale of their business. Sofiatou Abiodoun is 44 years old and is married to someone called Laurent. They have one dependent child, attending school. Sofiatou Abiodoun stopped school at the secondary level. Sofiatou Abiodoun has sold various products (canned goods, soap, sugar, etc) for fifteen years. This allows her to meet the needs of her child. Sofiatou Abiodoun buys her products in a market in Benin. With a goal of increasing the scale of her business, and to better meet her customers' needs, Sofiatou Abiodoun wishes to have this first loan with ALIDé, together with the other members of the HOUNKPO-NOU group.

loans.use: to purchase various products (canned goods, soaps, sugar, etc.)

loans.name: Andrei

texts.ru:
Андрей – женат, у него есть 11-летняя дочка. Андрей живет в Ивано-Франковске и занимается пассажирскими перевозками по Украине. У него всегда есть заказы, и система гибких скидок дает ему немалое преимущество. У Андрея есть свои постоянные клиенты, он каждый день развозит посылки из Италии. Андрей занимается этим бизнесом уже 9 лет, по 10-12 часов в день. Его ежемесячный доход составляет 5 000 гривен. 

Андрей работает на автомобиле, приобретенном в кредит, который уже полностью погасил. Его авто переоборудовано для работы на сжатом газе, что дает ему возможность экономить. Андрей собирается вложить полученные от КИВА средства в приобретение зимних шин и аккумуляторной батареи, чтобы привести свое транспортное средство в хорошее состояние. Со временем Андрей надеется приобрести более новое и качественное транспортное средство.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Andrei is married and has an 11 year-old daughter.  He lives in Ivano-Frankivsk and is involved in passenger transportation across Ukraine.  He always has orders, and a system of flexible discounts gives him a good advantage.  Andrei has regular customers, and he delivers packages from Italy every day.  He has been involved in this business for nine years, 10-12 hours per day.  His monthly income is 5,000 hryvnia.  Andrei works on a car that was purchased by using a loan, which he has now fully repaid.  His car was converted to run on compressed gas, which gives him an opportunity to operate it economically.  Andrei plans to invest the funds received from Kiva into a purchase of winter tires and an accumulator battery, in order to bring his vehicle up to a good condition.  With time, Andrei hopes to purchase a newer and better-quality transportation vehicle.

loans.use: purchase winter tires and an accumulator battery, in order to bring his vehicle up to a good condition

loans.name: Johan

texts.es: Johan, tiene la edad de 22 años, está en unión libre y vive con su esposa que es su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal, como lo son los abonos, herbicidas y pago de mano de obra. El actualmente cuenta con una plantación es estado regular pues acaba de pasar la cosecha y su cafetal necesita de la mejora de condiciones para mejorar para la próxima cosecha, por lo cual es que hará esta asistencia a su cafetal. El pretende con el crédito y la mejora a su cafetal obtener el máximo de ganancias para su bienestar familiar y tener una estabilidad económica más estable. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Johan is 22 years old.  He lives with his common-law wife who is his main priority.  He plans to use his loan to buy the supplies he needs to maintain his coffee plantation.  He will buy fertilizers and herbicides, and pay laborers.  Johan currently has a plantation which is in an average state.  He has just harvested and he needs to improve the condition of his plantation so that he can improve his next harvest.  This is why he will provide it with this care.

Johan plans to use his loan to improve his plantation so that he can obtain maximum profits for his family's well-being and enjoy greater financial stability.  This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to maintain his coffee plantation

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more stock of drinks like beers, soda, whiskey and wine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar and oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm fruit and palm kernels for oil production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more ladies' handbags and slippers for her business.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр женат, у него взрослая дочь. Он живет в Водяном и занимается выращиванием ранних овощей: помидор и редиса. У Александра две больших теплицы и две отдельные теплицы для рассады. В фермерский бизнес вложено 70 000 гривен. Ежегодно затраты на семена и пленку составляют 25 000 гривен. Александр занимается выращиванием овощей уже 6 лет. 

Александр планирует вложить кредит в 14 000 гривен в закупку пленки, семян и арматуры для новой дополнительной теплицы. Александр понимает, что этот бизнес – очень перспективный для этого аграрного региона. Поэтому в следующем году он планирует дальнейшее расширение: хочет купить землю  и построить там дополнительные теплицы.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Alexander is married and has an adult daughter.  He lives in Vodyanoye and is involved in growing early vegetables, such as tomatoes and radishes.  Alexander has two large greenhouses and two separate greenhouses for seedlings.  He has 70,000 hryvnia invested into the farming business.  His annual expenses amount to 25,000 hryvnia.  Alexander has been involved in growing vegetables for six years.  He plans to invest the 14,000 hryvnia loan into the purchase of plastic, seeds and fixtures for an additional greenhouse.  Alexander understands that this is a very promising business for this agricultural region.  This is why he plans future expansion next year.  He wants to purchase land and build additional greenhouses there.

loans.use: to purchase plastic, seeds and fixtures for an additional greenhouse

loans.name: Carlos Armando

texts.es:
Carlos Armando tiene 23 años es soltero, vive con los padres no tiene hijos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas.

Ventanilla VALLE ALTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Carlos Armando se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz en terrenos propios. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueño es comprar una casa más grande.

Disfruta mucho en sus tiempos libres haciendo deporte.
texts.en:
Carlos Armando is 23 years old.  He is single and lives with his parents.  He does not have any children.  He lives in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.

The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Carlos Armando is a farmer who grows corn and rice on his own land.  He buys his products in Ventanas and sells his products in Ventanas market.

Carlos Armando will use the loan that he requested to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure.  The loan will help him to increase his income which means he will be able to help his family and invest in his farming.  His dream is to buy a bigger house.

Carlos Armando enjoys taking part in sports in his free time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Mujeres Responsables Group

texts.es: El Banco Mujeres Responsable,  está formado por mujeres emprendedores que han luchado por cumplir sus sueños de tener un medio que le genere ingresos para la familia. Este banco lo conforman 10 integrantes de la misma localidad que son personas que se conocen y tienen objetivos y metas en la vida. Cada uno de los integrantes brindan un servicio diferente pero siempre con el objetivo de brindarles a sus clientes un buen servicio. Nora que es la presidenta del grupo y su actividad económica a la que se dedica es la elaboración de artesanía lo cual tiene años de experiencia, este negocio lo aprendió de forma empírica, ya que la mama le enseño y ahora ella se lo transmite a sus hijos que todavía se encuentran a su cargo y trabajan con ella para salir adelante, el crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de materia prima como cerámica, pintura y otros productos para la elaboración de las artesanías.  Actualmente todos los integrantes  están solicitando financiamiento para poder abastecerse de materia de prima.
texts.en:
The 'Mujeres Responsables' (Responsible Women) community bank is a group of entrepreneurial women who have worked hard to achieve their dreams of having a way of making income for their families.  This bank has ten members who are all from the same town.  They all know each other and all have goals and aims in life.  Each one of the members provides a different service but they all share the aim of providing their customers with a good service. 

Nora is the group's president and her business is making handicrafts.  She has years of experience in this line of work.  She learned the business from direct experience as her mom taught her.  Now she, in turn, is passing on the knowledge to her children who are in her care and work with her in order to get ahead in life.  Nora is requesting this loan to buy raw materials such as pottery, paint and other products for making handicrafts.  All the members of the group are requesting the loan to stock up with raw materials.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as pottery, paint and other products, for making handicrafts

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en: Lydia buys fresh fish from the market and fries them to sell at Ayensudo at Elmina. Lydia is married to a driver and has 4 dependents. She uses her income to assist her husband in paying their children’s school fees.  A loan will help buy more fresh fish to fry and sell, and this will result in an increase in sales which will enable her to expand her business.

loans.use: buy more fresh fish to fry and sell.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba has been a baker at Ayensudu near Elmina for four years now. She is a single parent with one child.  As a single parent she feeds, clothes, and pays her child's school fees with her income. Aba needs this loan to purchase bags of flour, sugar, and oil for baking. With the new profit, Aba would like to give her child the best education.

loans.use: to purchase bags of flour, sugar, and oil for baking

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena, de 23 años, es una mujer buena, amable y trabajadora, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene una hija de tres años, viven en una casa propia en donde comparten la alegría de educar y criar a su hija por quien hacen todos los esfuerzos y sacrificios necesarios para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Elena consiste en la venta de golosinas y productos de consumo de preferencia de los niños, posee un puesto en donde realiza su venta de golosinas. Éste se encuentra ubicada en uno de los parques mas concurridos de su ciudad, su día normalmente comienza a las 8 de la mañana y termina pasadas las 6 de la tarde. Entre todo este tiempo ella aprovecha algunos minutos de poca venta para ir a ver a su hija, quien todavía es muy pequeña y necesita mucha atención. Es una de las cosas que más le complican en su trabajo, pero también es algo que sabe que pronto podrá superar,  ya que su hija crece cada día mas. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la libertad que tiene para realizar otras actividades, a la vez que cuida su puesto de golosinas. Lleva 3 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil de su trabajo es tener que permanecer bajo el inclemente sol todo el día, espera que con el tiempo pueda poner una tienda donde pueda atender mejor a sus clientes. Este será el crédito número 7 con la institución MFP, siempre fue muy buena socia en su banco comunal en donde la quieren mucho por que es muy responsable y solidaria. Espera que le puedan brindar el préstamo que será un respaldo para ella y seguir aumentando su negocio. Esta convencida que seguirá siendo una socia muy puntual y pagara sus cuotas a tiempo como todos los prestamos que tuvo hasta ahora. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará más variedad de golosinas para poder ofrecer a sus clientes y así tenerlo mas implementado.
texts.en:
Elena, 23 years old, is a good women, friendly and hardworking. She lives with her partner with whom she has a 3 year old daughter. They live in their own home where they share the happiness of educating and bringing up their daughter and they put forth all their strength and make the necessary sacrifices in order to provide her a good quality of life.

Elena’s work consists of selling sweets and products that children enjoy eating. She has a stand where she sells her sweets. It is located in one of the busiest parks in the city. Her day normally begins at 8:00AM in the morning and finishes at 6:00PM in the afternoon. During this time she takes advantage of any moments when sales are low to go see her daughter who is still very young and needs a lot of attention. It is one of the things that complicate her work, but too it is something that she knows will soon pass, as each day her daughter grows a bit more.

The thing that she like most about her work is the freedom that she has to do other activities at the same time she is at her sweet stand. She has been doing this for three years and what she considers the most difficult thing about her work is having to be under the relentless sun all day. She hopes that with time she will be able to have a store where she can serve her clients better. 

This will be her 7th loan with MFP. She has always been a good member of the communal bank which she likes very much because of the care and unity. She hopes that you can provide the loan that will back her up so she can continue to expand her business. She is convinced that she would continue being a very punctual member and would pay her installments on time as she has done with all her loans so far. With the 1500 soles, she will have a greater variety of sweets to offer her customers and thus, more of it will be sold.

loans.use: to buy more sweets to supply her business

loans.name: Hilda Leopoldina

texts.es:
Hilda tiene 24 años es soltera, vive con los hijos de 8,4 años. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas.

Ventanilla VALLE ALTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Hilda se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz en terrenos propios. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueño es comprar un terreno para construir la casa.

Le gusta ayudar a los hijos hacer las tares.
texts.en:
Hilda, single, is 24 years old. She lives with her 2 children who are 8 and 4 years old. She lives in Recinto Voluntad de Dios in the Ventanas canton.

The VALLE ALTO Communal Bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, belonging to the canton of Ventanas. This area works in short-cycle crops such as corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Hilda works in agriculture growing corn and rice on her own property. She buys the supplies in Ventanas and sells them at the market in Ventanas. 

The money from this loan will be used to buy seed, fertilizer and compost for the crops. The loan will help her to increase her income for household expenses and to invest in planting. Her dream is to buy land to build a house. She likes to help the children with their chores.

loans.use: to buy seed to plant corn and rice, to buy supplies and fertilizer for the crops

loans.name: Johnny

texts.es: Johnny, tiene la edad de 46 años, está casado y vive con su esposa e hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal, como lo son los abonos y herbicidas. El actualmente cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación de este cultivo y además de tener ya varios años de experiencia para el buen manejo del cultivo. Él le hará una mejora a la plantación de café que posee para así obtener los mejores resultados de esta. El tienen como meta generar una muy buena cosecha para así venderla y obtener uno buenos ingresos para mejorar su bienestar y su estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Johnny is 46 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and children who are his main priority. 

He plans to use the money from the loan to buy supplies to care for his coffee plantation, such as compost and herbicides. 

Currently he has the land ready for cultivating and furthermore he has some years experience knowing how to manage the crop. He will make improvements to the coffee plantation in order to have the best results. He has as a goal to harvest a better crop to sell to obtain a good profit to improve his wellbeing and his financial standing. 

This is the first loan that he has received through Fudecosur. He has not had other loans before from the state banks, but Fudecosur has given the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies to care for his coffee plantation, such as compost and herbicides

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is a single parent with one child. She is a petty trader. She sells utensils, soap, and underwear at Ayensudo. As a single parent, she feeds, clothes, and pays her child's school fees. Esther will use her loan to purchase more utensils for sale. With the new profit, Esther wishes to expand her business by acquiring a shop for her business.

loans.use: to buy more utensils for sale

loans.name: Mikhail

texts.ru:
Михаил женат, у него один ребенок. Он с семьей живет в городе Хуст, Западная Украина. Михаил работает в строительной фирме. Он всегда работает добросовестно и отвечает за качество выполненных работ. В сфере строительства работает всю жизнь. Однако зарплата у него небольшая – всего 2 500 гривен. 

Михаилу необходим кредит в 10 000 гривен для личных нужд. Он хотел бы сделать ремонт ванной комнаты, заменить унитаз, установить умывальник и ванну, положить кафельную плитку в ванной комнате. Возможность сделать этот ремонт позволит Михаилу улучшить условия проживания своей семьи и сделает их жизнь более комфортной. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Mikhail is married and has one child. They live in the city of Hust in western Ukraine. Mikhail works for a construction company. He's a dedicated employee and is always ready to stand by the quality of his work. Although he's worked construction his whole life, Mikhail cannot boast of a high salary; his monthly income is only 2,500 grivnas. 
Mikhail requires a personal loan of 10,000 grivnas. He wishes to repair his bathroom: exchange the toliet, put in a sink and glazed floor tiles. These repairs will provide his family with a more comfortable life.

loans.use: to repair his bathroom: exchange the toilet, insert a new sink and put in glazed floor tiles.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: El señor  Francisco  nació en la localidad de la Angostura  actualmente se encuentra viviendo en la localidad de limoncito por mas de cinco años convive con la señora Dilma   tienen dos hijas una  de 4 años de edad y otra de 2 años. El se dedica a la mecánica los fines de semana en la localidad del Torno en el taller de su hermano, y entre semana trabaja como albañil en la ciudad de Santa Cruz. El crédito lo esta solicitando para comprar material de construcción para terminar su vivienda ya que  le falta construir un cuarto mas para las niñas y así brindarles  mayor comodidad a su familia, el esta muy agradecido con la institución por  la oportunidad que le brindan para mejorar su calidad de vida de el y de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco was born in the town of Angostura. He has been living in the town of Limoncito for more than 5 years with his partner Dilma and they have 2 daughters. One is 4 years old and the other is 2 years old. 

He is a mechanic working on weekends in the town of Torno in his brother’s workshop and during the week he works as a bricklayer in the city of Santa Cruz. 

He is asking for a loan to buy construction material in order to finish his house as it needs one more room for the children in order to give the family more comfortable living conditions. 

He is very grateful to the institution for the opportunity it gives him of improving the quality of life for him and all of his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish his house

loans.name: Maryuri Mariuxi

texts.es:
Maryuri  tiene 22 años es soltera, vive con un hijo de 3 años. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas.

Ventanilla VALLE ALTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Maryuri  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz en terrenos de familiares. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueño es comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando.

Le gusta  pasar con el hijo jugando.
texts.en:
Maryuri is 22 years old, single, and lives with her 3 year old son. She lives in Voluntad de Dios in the canton of Ventanas.

The Valle Alto Communal Bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, belonging to the canton of Ventanas. This area is dedicated to agriculture activities of short-cycle planting of corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Maryuri works in agriculture planting crops of corn and rice on family property. She buys her supplies in Ventanas, and she sells her crops at the market in Ventanas.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy seed, fertilizer and compost for the crops. The loan will help her increase her income for family use and to buy seed. Her dream is to buy land to continue planting. 

She likes to spend time playing with her son.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, and compost for the crops

loans.name: Bonny Tatiana

texts.es:
Bonny Tatiana tiene 23 años vive en unión libre, vive con el compañero y con los hijos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas.

Ventanilla VALLE ALTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Bonny  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz en terrenos de familiares. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueño es comprar un terreno  y vehículo de trabajo.

Le gusta  descansar y ver la televisión.
texts.en:
Bonny Tatiana is 23 years old and lives with her partner and children.  She lives in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.

The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Bonny is a farmer who grows corn and rice on land belonging to family members.  She makes her purchases in Ventanas and makes her sales in Ventanas market.

Bonny will use the loan that she requested to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure.  The loan will help her to increase her income which means she will be able to help her family and invest in her farming.  Her dream is to buy a plot of land and a vehicle for her work.

In her free time, Bonny likes to relax and watch television.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loans.name: San Jose Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Angelica tiene 52 años de edad tiene dos hijos adultos quienes han sido su motor para salir adelante y hou en día son su apoyo en todos los proyectos que ella emprende.
Desde hace 10 años la Sra. Angelica inició su negocio vendiendo comida ahi mismo colocó una pequeña vitrina con golosinas, actualmente solo se dedica a la venta de golosinas y aprovecha de campañas para venta de ropa y juguetes.
Gracias a su trabajo ella ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos, brindarles estudios y mejorar su casa. Una de sus metas es ampliar su negocio a lo mejor ofreciendo sus golosinas al por mayor.
En ésta ocasión ella invertirá en la compra de adornos navideños para aprovechar la demanda en el mes de diciembre.
texts.en:
Angelica is 52 years old and has two grown-up children who have been the driving force behind her getting ahead in life.  Now they are her support in all the projects that she undertakes.

Ten years ago, Angelica started her food business where she also set up a small display case with some candies inside.  She currently only sells candies but also makes the most of the different sales seasons in order to sell clothes and toys.

Thanks to her work, Angelica has managed to get her children ahead in life, provide them with an education and improve their home.  One of her aims is to expand her business, probably offering her candies wholesale.

On this occasion, Angelica will invest in buying Christmas ornaments in order to make the most of the demand which exists during the month of December.

loans.use: to buy Christmas ornaments to sell over the Christmas period

loans.name: Dorris

texts.en: Dorris is 38 years old and lives in Congo Town. She is married and has four children between the ages of 10 and 21. All of them are attending school: two with their aunt and two living at home. Dorris has been making soap for the past twenty years. She says her main challenge is the cost for palm oil that she uses to make soap. She started this business with money that she saved. She learned this business from her friends. Her favorite part about her business is the fast profits. She is requesting a loan to purchase more goods (caustic, palm oil, and wood) for her business. In the future, she wants to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more goods (caustic, palm oil, and wood) for making soap

loans.name: Mario José

texts.es:
Mario José  tiene 33 años vive en unión libre, vive con la compañera y la hija. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas.

Ventanilla VALLE ALTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Mario José se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueño es comprar un terreno.

Le gusta  dedicarse a los hijos.
texts.en:
Mario José is 33 years old and in a common law marriage. He lives with his wife and daughter in the community of Recinto Voluntad de Dios of the Ventanas canton.  

The VALLE ALTO communal bank is located in the community Voluntad de Dios, which belongs to the Ventanas canton. This bank is dedicated to short cycle agricultural work such as corn, rice and beans.

Mario José works in agricultural, growing rice and corn. He buys his products in Ventanas and does his selling in the Ventanas market.

The loan he has asked for is to buy seeds and fertilizer for his crops. The loan has helped to increase his income for his family and to invest in his crops. His dream is to buy a plot of land. 

He likes to spend time with his children.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizers for his crops.

loans.name: Víctor Pascual

texts.es:
Víctor Pascual tiene 47 años es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas.

Ventanilla VALLE ALTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Víctor Pascual se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueño es comprar un terreno.

Le gusta descansar y escuchar música.
texts.en:
Víctor Pascual is 47 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and children. He lives in the community of Recinto Voluntad de Dios in the Ventanas canton.

The VALLE ALTO communal bank is located in the community of Voluntad de Dios, which belongs to the Ventanas canton. This bank is dedicated to short cycle agricultural work such as corn, rice and gandul beans.

Víctor Pascual works in agriculture growing corn, rice and gandul beans. He buys his products in Ventanas and does his selling in the Ventanas market.  

The loan he asked for is to buy seed and fertilizer for his crops. The loan has helped him to increase his income for his family and to invest in his crops. His dream is to buy a plot of land.

He likes to rest and listen to music.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Alejandrina Pilar

texts.es:
Alejandrina Pilar  tiene 48 años es soltera, vive  con los hijos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas.

Ventanilla VALLE ALTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Alejandra  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace algunos años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueño es comprar vehículo.
texts.en:
Alejandrina Pilar is 48 years old.  She is single and lives with her children in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.

The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Alejandrina is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for some years.  She makes her purchases in Ventanas and makes her sales in Ventanas market.

Alejandrina requested this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure.  The loan will help her to increase her income so that she can provide for her family and invest in her farming.  Her dream is to buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Maria Narcisa

texts.es:
María Narcisa tiene 31 años es soltera, vive  con los hijos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas.

Ventanilla VALLE ALTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
María Narcisa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace algunos años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueño es  dar el estudio a los hijos para que tengan una profesión.

Le gusta  jugar con los hijos y salir de paseo.
texts.en:
María Narcisa is 31 years old. She is single and lives with her children in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.

The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

María Narcisa is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for some years. She makes her purchases in Ventanas and makes her sales in Ventanas market.

María Narcisa requested this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her to increase her income so that she can provide for her family and invest in her farming. Her dream is to provide her children with an education so that they can become professionals. 

In her free time, María Narcisa enjoys playing with her children and going out for walks.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase food ingredients for her dishes

loans.name: Moustapha

texts.fr:
Moustaphat habite dans la région sud sénégal,marié père de 3 enfants ,deux garçon et une fille de 11 mois.Les 2 enfants sont à l'école et la fillette reste à la maison avec sa mama qui est ménagère,avec son métier,il supporte toutes les charge de sa famille.
Moustapha a démarré son métier dans la capitale du sénégal à l'age de 16 ans.Depuis 1983,il a eu son diplome,pour revenir travailler dans sa localité.Avec ce crédit,il achète du bois à l'est de la région pour venir confectionner des meuble qui seront exposés pour la vente.
moustapha dans l'avenir,veut avior des machines de rabotage,siage ,et élargir le nombre d'employés dans son atelier de travail
texts.en:
Moustapha lives the southern region of Senegal. He is married and the father of 3 children - two boys and an 11 month old girl. The two eldest go to school, and the young girl stays at home with his mother, who is a housewife. With his craft, he covers all the expenses of the family.
Moustapha started his activity in the capital of Senegal at 16 years of age. He has had his diploma since 1983, and returned to work in his local area. With this loan, he will purchase wood in the east of the region, in order to create furniture which will be displayed for sale. In the future, Moustapha wants to have machinery for planing and sawing, and to increase the numbers of employees in his workshop.

loans.use: to buy wood for woodworking, to strengthen his workshop.

loans.name: Carmen Pilar

texts.es:
Carmen Pilar tiene 24 años es soltera, vive  con el hijo de 5 meses de edad  y los padres. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas.

Ventanilla VALLE ALTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Carmen Pilar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueño es tener dinero para su hijo por que es madre soltera.

Le gusta  cuidar con su hijo.
texts.en:
Carmen Pilar is 24 years old.  She is single and lives with her 5-month-old son and parents in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.

The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Carmen Pilar is a farmer who grows corn.  She makes her purchases in Ventanas and makes her sales in Ventanas market.  She requested this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure.  The loan will help her to increase her income which will allow her to provide for her family and invest in her farming.  Her dream is to have money for her son because she is a single mother.  She likes to take care of her son.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Elida

texts.es: Elida, de 47 años, es una mujer amable, buena y muy trabajadora, esta casada con Hermogenes quien es su compañero incondicional desde hace muchos años, fruto a su matrimonio tienen dos hijos quienes ya son mayores y tiene familia propia. Juntos habitan en una casa propia en donde educaron y brindaron lo mejor a sus hijos. Ahora trabajan mucho para poder tener una vejez tranquila. El negocio de Elida consiste en dos cosas, el primero es el de vender golosinas en la puerta de un colegio de la ciudad a la hora de entrada y salida. Cuando no esta en el centro educativo se va a ubicarse en uno de los parques más importantes de la ciudad de Pucallpa, ella a puesto todo su empeño en hacer de su pequeño negocio uno de los más concurridos por lo clientes. Los cuales la prefieren a ella debido a la amabilidad con que los trata. Además de vender ahí tiene una pequeña pero muy surtida tienda de abarrotes en su casa el cual se hace cargo su esposo. Con el tiempo pudieron encontrar la manera de trabajar juntos y así producir ambos los ingresos a su hogar. Los 5 años que lleva en este negocio le han servido para ganarse un lugar preferencial en el parque, ya que esta ubicada en la esquina más transitada, donde es mucho más fácil de encontrarla. Lo que más le gusta es conversar con sus vecinas de venta, pero lo que menos le gusta es tener que permanecer todo el día en su puesto sin poder ir a ningún lado. Espera más adelante poner su tienda de golosinas, la cual le pueda dar mejores ingresos. Este será el crédito número 11 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para poder continuar aumentando su capital de trabajo. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará productos para implementar su venta de golosinas, además de algunos abarrotes y cosas para su tienda.
texts.en:
