47-year-old Elida is a kind and hard-working woman.  She is married to Hermogenes who has been her unconditional partner for many years.  The couple have two children who are now grown up and have their own families.  They live together in their own home where they educated their children and provided them with the best.  They work a lot now so that they can enjoy a peaceful old age.

Elida's has two businesses.  Firstly, she sells candies outside a school in the city at the beginning and end of the school day.  When she is not at the school, she goes to one of the most important parks in the city of Pucallpa.  She has put a great deal of effort into ensuring her business is one of the most popular with the customers.  The customers prefer to buy from her because of the kindness she displays when she serves them.  In addition to selling in this location, she also has a small but very well-stocked grocery store in her home which her husband takes care of.  Over time, they have been able to find a way of working together so that they can both make income for their household.

The five years that Elida has spent working in this business have enabled her to gain a preferential location in the park as her stall is located in the busiest corner where it is much easier to find her.  What she enjoys about her business is chatting to her fellow traders.  What she least enjoys is having to stay on her stall all day without being able to go anywhere.  She hopes, in the future, to set up a candy store which will make her better income.

This will be Elida's 11th loan from MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial support so that she can continue increasing her working capital.  She will use the 1,000 soles that she has requested to buy products with which to stock her candy business.  She will also buy some groceries and products for her store.

loans.use: to buy candies and soda to stock her stall.  She will also buy products to stock her store

loans.name: Yessenia

texts.es:
Yessenia, es una joven soltera  muy emprendedora que a sus 19 años de edad tiene un negocio propio dedicado a la venta de ropa, desde hace 9 meses, los cuales han sido de mucho esfuerzo y lucha constante para salir adelante, gracias a esa fuerza interior con la que cuenta. Vive en casa de su tía a la cual apoya con el fruto de su trabajo, Yessenia demuestra ser una joven luchadora trabajando también en un viñedo como operaria y con los ingresos que obtiene en esta labor, los invierte en su negocio de venta ropa.

Con el préstamo al cual desea acceder, ella comprara más ropa para su negocio y así poder crecer aun mas, el mayor sueño de Yessenia es mejorar al máximo su calidad de vida, estudiar para seguir una carrera que la ayude a mejorar en su negocio y asimismo incrementar su mercadería sobre todo demostrar que ella a sus 19 años puede ser una mujer de éxito.

Gracias a la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva ella podrá realizar sus sueños y no solo eso, sino también desarrollarse como una microempresaria y mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Yessenia is a young single woman.  She is very enterprising and, at 19 years of age, she has her own business selling clothes.  She has been in this business for nine months and it has required a lot of effort and constant hard work in order to make progress.  She has managed to achieve this thanks to her internal strength.  Yessenia lives in her aunt's house and supports her with the fruit of her work.  Yessenia is a tenacious young woman who also works as a laborer in a vineyard.  She invests the income she makes from that work in her clothes business.

Yessenia will use the loan that she is requesting to buy more clothes for her business so that she can grow it even further.  Her biggest dream is to improve her quality of life to the max.  She would like to study for a degree which will help her to improve her business.  She would also like to increase her merchandise and, above all, show that at 19 years of age she can be a successful woman.

Thanks to the help of Kiva lenders, Yessenia will be able to fulfill her dreams.  Not only that, she will also be able to develop as a micro-businesswoman and improve her profits.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more groceries for sale.

loans.name: Dora Clemencia

texts.es:
Dora Clemencia  tiene 43 años vive en Unión Libre, vive con el compañero y  con los 5 hijos.Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantón Ventanas.

Ventanilla VALLE ALTO  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Dora se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueño es que sus hijos sean profesionales y tengan un trabajo digno.
Le gusta  trabajar duro.
texts.en:
Dora Clemencia  is 43 years old and lives together with her partner and five children in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.

The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Dora is a farmer who grows corn.  She makes her purchases in Ventanas and makes her sales in Ventanas market.

Dora has requested this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure.  The loan will help her to increase her income so that she can provide for her family and invest in her farming.  Her dream is for her children to become professionals and have decent jobs.

Dora enjoys working hard.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Olvin Damin

texts.es:
Olvin de 30 años de edad, es soltero, vive en San Luis Planes Santa Bárbara con su familia.
Olvin desde pequeño realiza actividades de cultivo de café con su familia y trabajos de serigrafía, es una persona muy trabajadora, actualmente tiene cultivado 1 manzana de café, de la cual saca producción de café pergamino húmedo y lo vende en el mercado local, pero muchas veces llegan los compradores hasta su casa. Esta motivado con el cultivo ya que este producto tiene gran demanda y va obtener buenas ganancias. A solicitado este préstamo de L.13,000.00 para invertir en siembra de vivero ampliando así 1/4 mas de manzana de terreno, donde va cubrir pago de jornaleros y fertilizantes para dicha siembra. Su plan es mejorar la producción y seguir obteniendo ganancias.
texts.en:
Olvin is 30 years old and single.  He lives in San Luis Planes Santa Bárbara with his family.  Ever since he was little he has worked with his family growing coffee.  He also does screen printing jobs.  He is a very hard-working person.

He currently has one “manzana” (just under a half of an acre) where he is growing coffee.  He takes his production of wet parchment coffee to sell at the local market.  However, the buyers often come to his house.  He is motivated with farming because this product is in great demand, and he will get good income.

He has requested this loan for 13,000 lempira to invest in planting the nursery.  This way he will expand to ¼ of a manzana more land.  He will use the loan to pay the day workers and to buy fertilizers for the crop.  His plan is to improve production and to continue getting income.

loans.use: to invest in planting the coffee nursery, to pay the day workers, and to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Mariama

texts.en: Mariama is a petty trader selling tin tomatoes, salt, charcoal and other food items in Ayensudo, near Elmina.  She has been selling charcoal for two years. Mariama is married to a businessman and has three children. She uses her income to assist the husband in paying utility bills. She needs this loan to buy more food items and charcoal for sale. With the new profit, Mariama will expand her business.

loans.use: buy more food items and charcoal for sale

loans.name: Librada

texts.es: La señora Librada a sus 46 años de edad se dedica desde hace 6 años a la confección de camas para bebe, realiza su trabajo sola y presenta dificultades puesto que le hace falta una maquina de coser que le permita agilizar su trabajo y así poder aumentar su producción y número de clientes y con esto su calidad de vida y la de sus padres. La señora Librada tiene la fé de poder conseguir la maquina de la cual carece y poder así cumplir con sus pedidos, mejorar su producción y cumplir su sueño de poder ampliar su taller de confección.
texts.en: Librada is 46 years old.  She has been making baby bedding for six years.  She carries out her work alone and faces difficulties because she lacks a sewing machine which would allow her to work more easily.  It would enable her to increase her production and her number of customers, and thereby improve her own quality of life and that of her parents.  Librada believes that she will be able to acquire the machine that she lacks and thereby fill her orders, improve her production and fulfill her dream of expanding her sewing workshop.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Jenneh

texts.en: Jenneh is 37 years old and lives in Congo Town. She is married with four children between 9 and 18 years old. They are in school and live at home. Jenneh has been operating a cook shop (restaurant) for the past twenty-five years. She says her main challenge is the location of her restaurant. Jenneh started this business with the help of her husband and she has learned this business from her mother. Her favorite part about her business is that her food sells out everyday and she makes good profit. Jenneh is requesting this loan to purchase more goods (coal, rice, onion, peppers, and oil) for her restaurant. In the future, she would like to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more goods (coal, rice, onion, peppers, and oil) for her business

loans.name: Ilda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DE LAS NIEVES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ilda; ella tiene 45 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende arroz,azúcar,leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener más adelante un carro. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite y galletas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ilda is a member of the Virgen de Las Nieves communal bank.  The bank is in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

Hilda, age 45, is in a common-law marriage and has four children.  She alternates her daily activities with her grocery store business.  She sells rice, sugar, milk, and oil.  She works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.  It is through this business that she gets her children ahead.

Her dream for later on is to have a car.

She is requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, oil, and cookies wholesale.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, oil, and cookies wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cassava, maize and other food items in bulk

loans.name: Yovana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DE LAS NIEVES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yovana; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en un laboratorio, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, también la socia se dedica al negocio compra y venta de carros junto con su esposo y de esta manera sacan adelante a su hijo, el sueño de la socia es tener su propio laboratorio. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos para el negocio de compra y venta de carros.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Yovana is a member of the Virgen de Las Nieves communal bank.  The bank is in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

Yovana, age 38, is in a common-law marriage and has one child.  She alternates her daily activities with her her work in a lab.  She works from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  She also has a business together with her husband of buying and selling cars.  This is the way they get their child ahead.

Her dream is to have her own lab.

She is requesting the loan to buy replacement parts for the business of buying and selling cars. 

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for the business of buying and selling cars.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es: Gustavo, de 24 años, es un joven padre de familia muy amable, sencillo y trabajador, vive en casa de sus padres junto a su conviviente Mariela de 18 años y su querido hijo Ken de 3 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Gustavo consiste en la compra y venta de pescado. Desde hace mucho tiempo viene realizando esta actividad que le permite ser su fuente económica y así puede mantener a su familia con la tranquilidad de que no le falte nada en su casa. su constante animo de superación ha hecho que incursione en este negocio y poco a poco se ha hecho muy conocido, ya que él vende el pescado más fresco y sabroso del mercado y es un vendedor muy alegre, que siempre recibe a sus clientes una sonrisa. Además alquila un vehiculo el cual le proporciona un ingreso adicional, al principio le fue muy complicado, pero con el pasar del tiempo empezó a consolidarse. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientas. Lleva 4 años realizando esta actividad y considera que los más difícil es soportar el intenso olor que sale de los pescados, ya que se impregna en la ropa. Espera tener en el futuro un vehiculo acondicionado que le permita transportar sus productos sin que se malogren. Este será el tercer préstamo con MFP, esta muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su negocio, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 soles, comprará mas productos para seguir vendiendo, a parte de dar mantenimiento a su vehiculo comprándole algunas piezas y pagando al mecánico que le haga el trabajo.
texts.en:
Gustavo, age 24, is a young father who is very kind, unassuming, and hard-working.  He lives in his parents’ house with his common-law wife, 18 year old Mariela, and his beloved three year old son, Ken.  He wants to give them a better quality of life.

Gustavo buys and sells fish.  He has been doing this for a long time, and it is his source of income.  This is the way he manages to support his family with the peace of mind that they lack for nothing at home.  His constant motivation to excel led him to enter this business and he has made himself very well-known over time because he sells the freshest and most delicious fish at the market.  He is a pleasant salesman who always greets his customers with a smile. 

He also rents a vehicle, which provides him with additional income.  At first it was very complicated for him, but in time he became more capable.  

What he likes the most about his work is talking with his customers.  He has been doing this business activity for four years.  He considers the most difficult part to be putting up with the intense smell of the fish because it permeates his clothes.  He hopes in the future to have a vehicle that is set up to allow him to transport his products without the bad odor.  

This will be his third loan with MFP.  He is very happy to know that he will have financial support.  That way he will feel certain that his business will advance.  He pledges, once again, to make his payments on time as he did with the previous loans that he had.  He will use the requested 2,000 soles to buy more products in order to keep selling.   He will also have maintenance performed on his vehicle.  He will buy some parts and pay a mechanic to do the work.

loans.use: to buy more fish in order to stock his stand and to provide maintenance to his vehicle.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DE LAS NIEVES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Julio Cesar; el tiene 28 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en la liga de basket, ella trabaja en el área administrativa en arbitraje, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio el socio quiere salir adelante, el sueño del socio es tener su propia academia donde pueda enseñar basket. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar un equipo de sonido para implementar su casa.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "Virgen de las Nieves" Communal Bank. This bank is located in the distruct of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of Cusco.
This is Mr. Julio Cesar. He is 28 and single. He shares his daily activities with his work with the basketball league as a referee. He works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. He wants to get ahead through this work. His dream is to have his own academy where he can teach basketball. He is requesting this loan to buy sound equipment for his home.
He is happy to have this loan and promises to repay his quotas on time.

loans.use: to buy sound equipment for his home.

loans.name: Pedro Jorge

texts.es:
Pedro Jorge  tiene 41 años casado, vive con la esposa  y dos  hijos, de 10 y 5 años. Vive en el Recinto América en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto América, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra  de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Pedro Parra  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz  desde hace diez años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende a cualquier comerciante.

El crédito solicito para la compra insumos, semillas, fertilizantes y poder sembrar del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos y el bienestar de la familia y para invertir. 
Su sueño es comprar una finca.

Le gusta hacer deporte con los vecinos del barrio.
texts.en:
Pedro Jorge is 41 years old.  He is married and lives together with his wife and two children who are 10 and 5 years old.  He lives in América, in Ventanas canton.

The 'Unidos Venceremos' community bank is located in América, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Pedro Jorge is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for ten years.  He makes his purchases in Ventanas and sells his produce to any trader.

Pedro Jorge requested this loan to buy supplies, seeds and fertilizers so that he can sow his corn.  The loan will help him to increase his income, improve his family's well-being, and invest.  His dream is to buy a farm.

Pedro Jorge enjoys taking part in sports alongside his neighbors.

loans.use: to buy supplies, seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Rosalina Alejandra

texts.es: Rosalina Alejandra es una emprendedora que ha tenido éxitos, su actividad económica es la venta de mercadería en general , no es la primera vez que la señora Rosalina  tiene crédito con Fundación León 2000, ella nos explica que gracias  al apoyo que se le brindado ha aumentado su inventario ofreciéndole a sus clientes variedad de productos. Rosalinda está solicitando actualmente crédito para comprar mercadería como sandalias, zapatos deportivos, zapatilla, shorts entre otros productos que sus clientes les solicitan.
texts.en: Rosalina Alejandra is an entrepreneur who has been successful.  Her business is selling general merchandise.  This is not the first time that Rosalina has received a loan from Fundación León 2000.  She tells us that, thanks to the support she has received, she has increased her stock and is able to offer her customers a variety of products.  Rosalinda is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as sandals, sports shoes, sneakers, shorts and other products that her customers are requesting.

loans.use: to buy sandals, sports shoes, sneakers, shorts and other products

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Juan José, tiene la edad de 55 años, está casado y vive con su esposa e hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El va comprar unos terneros para el engorde pues cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación de este proyecto en su mejor forma. El tiene como meta generar el máximo de las ganancias para su bienestar familiar y seguir adelante con la responsabilidades de su hogar, el pretende con esos animales poder venderlos y así tener una estabilidad económica  más estable. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Juan José is 55 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children who are his main priority.  He will buy calves in order to fatten them, as he has land suitable to carry out this project successfully.  His goal is to maximize his profits so he can provide for the well-being of his family and his responsibilities around the home.  He believes he can sell these animals and, in doing so, stabilize his finances.

This is the first loan that Juan José has received from FUDECOSUR.  He had never received loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy cattle for meat

loans.name: Nancy Pilar

texts.es:
NANCY PILAR tiene 33 años es soltera, vive con la mamÁ, Tiene una hija. Vive en el Recinto América  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto América, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Nancy Briones  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace diez años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de insumos, abonos, urea, fertilizantes,insecticidas. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es comprar una finca.

En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar.
texts.en:
Nancy Pilar is 33 years old, single, and lives with her mother. She has one daughter. They live in La América  in Ventanas canton.

This community bank is called "Unidos Venceremos" (Together We Shall Overcome). It is located in La América, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Nancy has been growing corn for ten years. She makes her purchases in Ventanas each month and makes her sales in the market in the same town.

Nancy is requesting this loan to buy fertilizers, urea, manure, and insecticide. The loan money will help her increase her income so she can cover her family’s needs and also she will invest some of it in her business. Her dream is to buy a farm.

In her free time Nancy enjoys relaxing.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, urea, manure, and insecticide

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita, de 27 años, es una mujer amable y muy buen, trabaja mucho ya que desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su menor hijo de 2 años, es conviviente con su pareja Ricardo quien tiene 40 años y con el trabaja mucho para poder salir adelante, vive en casa de sus padres ya que esta en proceso de comprar uno propio. El trabajo de Margarita consiste en el alquiler de una unidad de transporte de cuatro ruedas. Con el transcurrir del tiempo los ahorros que había guardado durante mucho tiempo, por fin tiene sus frutos, puesto que con ellos pudo comprar el carro que tanto ansiaba. Ahora a puesto a trabajar su vehículo como colectivo en la ciudad de Pucallpa. Gracias a esto sus ingresos han mejorado, ya que anteriormente percibía muy poco dinero de los trabajos eventuales que realizaba. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo como dueña del bus, es que le permite viajar constantemente y disfrutar de los paisajes, lleva 3 años en esta actividad y lo más difícil para ella es tener que madrugar para cumplir con los horarios de salida, sabe que es duro pero que a la larga le dará muy buenos resultados. Espera en el futuro pueda comprar otro carro y salir adelante trabajando de buena forma. Este será el crédito número 7 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para poder continuar aumentando su capital de trabajo. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará algunos repuestos y mandará al taller su vehículo para su revisión semestral.
texts.en:
27-year old Margarita is a good friendly woman who works hard as she wishes to provide a better standard of living for her young son who is two years old. She lives with her 40-year old husband Ricardo and together their goal is to get ahead in life. She lives in her parents’ house but is in the process of buying a place of her own.

Margarita earns her living by renting out her 4-wheeled vehicle. After a long time she had saved enough money to buy the car she had longed for. Now she runs it as a colectivo (shared taxi) in the town of Pucallpa. As a result her income has increased; beforehand she didn’t earn much money from the casual work she was doing.

Margarita really enjoys being the owner of a taxi as she can travel constantly and enjoy the countryside. She’s been doing this work for three years. The most difficult part for her is getting up very early in the morning in order to keep to the schedule. While the work is hard, she knows that in the long-term it will bring positive results.

In the future she would like to buy another vehicle and continue to make progress. This will be her seventh loan with MFP. She is very happy to know that she has financial support to keep expanding her business. With the S/.1000 Margarita is seeking, she will buy spare parts and send her vehicle to the garage for its regular inspection.

loans.use: buy spare parts and have her vehicle serviced

loans.name: Berta Ines

texts.es: La señora Berta Inés se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comidas como almuerzos y refrigerios a trabajadores de dos empresas del municipio de Envigado localizadas al sur de la cuidad de Medellín, esta labor la inicia con la necesidad de tener un ingreso con el cual cubrir los gastos de su familia puesto que su esposo murió y su hija tiene inconvenientes de salud. La señora Berta Inés requiere para su negocio y la elaboración de las comidas insumos tales como verduras, condimentos y una olla para cocinar de mayor capacidad. El sueño de la señora Berta Inés es tener su propio restaurante y ver mejoras en la salud de su hija.
texts.en:
Señora Berta Inés makes and sells food such as lunches and light snacks to the workers of the two companies located in the municipality of Envigado, south of the town of Medellín. She started this business when her husband died and she needed to earn money to cover the family’s expenses. She also has a daughter with health problems.

Berta Inés needs to buy ingredients such as vegetables, condiments, and larger saucepans in which to cook larger quantities of food. Her dreams are to open her own restaurant and see her daughter’s health improve.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and large saucepans

loans.name: Heydy Ereydy

texts.es:
Heydy Ereydy tiene 19 años es soltera, vive con la abuela, no tiene hijos. Vive en el Recinto América  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto América, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Heydy se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace tres años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es tener una casa.
Descansar.
texts.en:
Heydy Ereydy is 19 years old and single.  She lives with her grandmother and doesn't have any children.  She lives in the América district, in Ventanas canton.

The communal bank "UNIDOS VENCEREMOS" ["Together We Will Overcome"] is located in the América district, which is part of Ventanas canton.  The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Heydy has been working in agriculture growing corn and rice for the last three years.  She purchases her supplies in Ventanas, and sells her products in the market there.

She is requesting the loan for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. The loan will help her to increase her income for use by her family and for investment.  Her dream is to have a home.

In her spare time, she likes to relax.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loans.name: Griselda

texts.es:
Griselda nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Cusco esta ciudad del sureste del Perú ubicada en la vertiente oriental de la Cordillera de los Andes). 

Griselda tiene 35 años edad y es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene un hijo de 13 trece años, ella alterna sus actividades del hogar con su trabajo, ella trabaja en una empresa de servicio de encomiendas y su cargo es coordinadora de entrega y recepción de encomiendas, ella trabaja desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche en dos turnos. Ya son 4 años que trabaja y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que le pone en su trabajo. Griselda en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para ahorrar y para uso personal, ella específicamente va usar el credito para la educación y alimentación de su hija. Su sueño de Griselda es tener su propio negocio y está pensando abrir una cabina de internet o un multiservicios. 

Griselda es integrante del grupo “Emprendedores” lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Griselda was born in the city of Cusco (Cusco is a city in the south-east of Peru, located in the eastern part of the Andes mountain range).

Griselda is 35 years old and is married; from this marriage she has a 13-year-old child.  She combines her household activities with her work; she works for a company that provides parcel service, and her role is coordinator of package delivery and receipt.  She works from 8 in the morning until 10 at night, in two shifts.  She has been doing this work for four years, and it is going very well for her thanks to the efforts that she puts into her work.

On this occasion Griselda is requesting a loan for savings and personal use.  More specifically, she will use the loan for the education and food for her child.  Griselda's dream is to have her own business, and she is thinking about opening an internet cabin or a multi-service business.

Griselda is a member of the "Emprendedores" ["Entrepreneurs"] group, which is made up of 12 members who live in the city of Cusco, which is in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco in Peru.

loans.use: for her child's education and food.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Promujer Group

texts.es:
Este es un grupo de señoras que ha recibido dos préstamos por parte de Fundación Mujer, ahora se financiara a dos integrantes del Banco Mujer, Anita y Herminia,quienes van por el segundo nivel de créditos, ambas son vecinias de Paso Canoas, frontera de Costa Rica Panama, y se dedican a la misma actividad de servicios, venta de comidas y golosinas, desde hace varios años atras; pero no son competencia directa entre si, ya que Herminia tiene su local sobre la calle principal a la aduna y Anita la tiene en una comunidad que se llama Laurel que se ubica a unos 6 kilometros de Paso Canoas.
Esta es una fuente importante de generación de ingresos para la economia domestica, ya que en el caso de Herminia es su única fuente de ingresos y en el caso de Anita, su compañero es un trabajador subempleado de labores agricolas, quien muchas veces no logra trabajar una semana completa, de allí que lo que logra llevar a su casa como salario es variable y con la actividad de Anita se complementa el presupuesto de la familia.
Este préstamo se utilizara para reforzar el capital de trabajo de las sodas y se invertira en la compara de refrescos gaseosos, jugos, galletas y bocadillos así como en la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de los casados, hamburgesas, tacos ete.
Las metas a corto plazo es poder contar con recursos economicos, para hacer mejoras a sus viviendas, tanto en sus techos como los pisos.
texts.en: This is a group of women who have received two loans from Fundacion Mujer (Women’s Foundation).  Now, the organization will fund two of the members of Banco Mujer (Women’s Bank), Anita and Herminia, who are in their second loan cycle.  Both of the women are neighbors in Paso Canoas, on the border between Costa Rica and Panama, and they have worked in the same business, selling food and candies, for many years.  They are not in direct competition with each other since Herminia’s store is on the main street and Anita’s is in a neighborhood called Laurel which is 6 kilometers from Paso Canoas.  This is an important source of income generation for their families, as it is Herminia’s only source of income and Anita’s partner is an under-employed farm worker who often cannot work a full week.  What he is able to bring home as salary varies, so Anita’s work supplements the family’s budget.  This loan will be used to strengthen the capital earned from selling sodas and will be invested in the purchase of the raw materials to make hamburgers, tacos, etc.  The women’s short-term goal is to be able to count on their financial resources to make home improvements, both on the roof and floors.

loans.use: buy soft drinks, juices, crackers, and candies.

loans.name: Damarys Eugenia

texts.es:
Damarys Eugenia tiene 35 años es casada, vive con el esposo e hijos de  9 y 2  años. Vive en el Recinto América  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto América, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Damarys Briones  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 15 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  tener un terreno propio.

En los tiempos libres se dedica a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Damarys Eugenia is 35 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children who are nine and two. She lives in the América township in the canton of Ventanas. 

The communal bank "Unidos Venceremos" [Together We Win] is located in the América township belonging to the Ventanas canton. This bank is dedicated to short-cycle farming, growing corn and rice.  

Damarys Briones has devoted herself to growing corn for 15 years. She purchases her supplies in Ventanas and sells her crops in the market there. 

The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizer for growing corn and rice. The loan has allowed her to increase her earnings for family consumption and for investment. Her dream is to have her own plot of land. 

In her free time she devotes herself to her children.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TINKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gregoria; ella tiene 58 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de jugos, ella trabaja en el mercado, ella prepara diferentes jugos como jugo de papaya, jugo de naranja, jugo de plátano entre otros jugos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener otro local donde pueda vender los jugos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas como platanos, papayas, naranjas y azúcar para que prepare los jugos.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gregoria is a partner in the communal bank "TINKA".  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is located in the province and departments of Cusco.  

Gregoria, the partner, is 58 years old and is married with two children.  She alternates her daily activities with a business that sells juice.  She works in the market where she prepares different juices, such as papaya juice, orange juice, and plaintain juice, among others.  She works from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  Through this job, she provides for her children.  Her dream is to have another location where she can sell her juices.  Gregoria requests the loan to buy fruits (such as plantains, papayas, and oranges) and sugar to prepare the juices.

Gregoria is happy to have received this loan, and she promises to make the payments on her loan.

loans.use: To buy fruits (such as plantains, papayas, and oranges) and sugar to prepare fruit juices.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 25 años, es una mujer joven, amable y muy trabajadora, es madre de un niño quien es tiene 5 años, es conviviente con su pareja Julio de 28 años quien es el padre de su hijo. Ella a lado de su familia vive en una casa propia en donde comparte la alegría de vivir juntos y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. María se dedica a la venta de zapatos y ropa, de manera quincenal o mensual, dependiendo de la demanda de sus productos. Ella trae de la ciudad de Lima gran variedad de mercadería que luego son distribuidos a sus clientes que previamente le han hecho el pedido. Asimismo recorre las calles de la ciudad de Pucallpa, en busca de clientes que deseen comprar alguna prenda. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es vender y está muy feliz cuando lográ vender toda la mercadería. Lleva 8 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar los zapatos, ya que las cajas que trae son muy pesadas y la cansan mucho, espera tener con tiempo una tienda de calzados donde pueda vender con mayor comodidad a sus clientes. Este será el noveno préstamo con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará mas zapatos, ropa y otros artículos de uso personal, ya que aumentara su variedad de productos.
texts.en:
María, aged 25, is a friendly and very hard-working young women.  She is the mother of a 5-year-old child, and lives with her partner Julio, aged 28, who is the father of her son.  She lives with her family in their own home, where she shares the joy of living together and being able to have a better quality of life.

María works selling shoes and clothing, twice a month or monthly depending on the demand for her products.  She brings a large variety of merchandise from the city of Lima, which she then distributes to her customers, who have previously placed orders.  She also travels the streets of the city of Pucallpa, looking for customers who might want to purchase some items.  What she likes most about her work is selling, and she is very happy when she is able to sell all her merchandise.

She has been doing this work for eight years, and considers the most difficult thing to be transporting the shoes, as the cases which she obtains are very heavy and carrying them is exhausting.  She hopes with time to have a shoe store where she can sell to her customers with more comfort.

This will be her ninth loan with MFP, and as such she hopes for your collaboration so she can continue with her goals.  For her part, she promises once again to comply with making her repayments, as she did with her previous loans.  She is also grateful to be part of the communal bank, because all the members are responsible and very supportive.  

With the 2,000 soles requested, she will purchase more shoes, clothing and other items for personal use, so that she can increase the variety of her products for sale.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing, shoes, and personal items.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: Rigoberto, tiene la edad de 45 años, está casado y vive con su esposa y 2 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal, el tiene pensado comprar los abonos, herbicidas para mejorar  su plantación. El actualmente cuenta con la plantación en condiciones regulares y lo que quiere es asistirla para mejorar su próxima cosecha. El tiene como meta generar el máximo de ganancias vendiendo la cosecha para así tener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica de su futuro.Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Rigoberto, 45 years old, is married and lives with his wife and 2 children who are his top priority.  With the loan, he aims to buy inputs for the care of his coffee.  He plans on buying fertilizers and herbicides to improve planting.  Now, his planting is in fair condition and what he wants is to improve his next harvest.  His goal is to generate maximum profit by selling the crop in order to have a better quality of life and a stable financial future.  This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not had any previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSURE has given him this loan with better facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: improve his coffee planting.

loans.name: Wilton Cristobal

texts.es:
Wilton  Cristobal tiene 23 años es casado, vive con la esposa y con su hija  de 4  años. Vive en el Recinto América  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto América, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Wilton se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 10 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando.

En los tiempos libres disfruta mucho hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Wilton Cristobal is 23 years old and married.  He lives with his wife and his four-year-old daughter in the América district, in Ventanas canton.

The communal bank "UNIDOS VENCEREMOS" ["United We Will Overcome"] is located in the América district, which is part of Ventanas canton.  The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Wilton has worked in agriculture growing corn for the last ten years.  He purchase his supplies in Ventanas, and sells his products in the market there.

The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.  The loan will help him to increase his income for use by his family and for investment.  His dream is to buy a plot of land that he can continue to plant.

In his free time, he really enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

Saira se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 4 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

En el tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión y hacer deporte.

The communal bank "UNIDOS VENCEREMOS" ["United We Will Overcome"] is located in the América district, which is part of the Ventanas canton.  The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Saira has been working in agriculture growing corn for the last four years.  She purchases her supplies in Ventanas, and sells her products in the the market there.

The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.  The loan will help her to increase her income for use by her family  and for investment.  Her dream is to buy a home.

In her free time, she enjoys watching television and playing sports.

loans.name: Christa

texts.es:
Christa nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Ciudad del sureste del Perú ubicada en la vertiente oriental de la Cordillera de los Andes). 

Christa tiene 22 años edad y es soltera, ella estudió la carrera técnica de computación e informática en uno de los más prestigiosos instituto de la ciudad del Cusco y está trabajando en una empresa privada de envió y recepción de encomiendas, ella trabaja como digitadora de informacion sube datos a un software. Ya son seis meses que trabaja y le va muy bien. Christa y su hermana Milagros van abrir un pequeño negocio de venta de comida ya tiene todos los implementos de la pollería pero solo les falta dinero para el alquiler del local.  Su sueño de Christa es abrir otro negocio de venta de pintura. 
 
Christa es integrante del grupo “Emprendedores” lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco, Perú.
texts.en:
Christa was born in the city of Cusco (a city in southeast Peru, along the eastern slope of the Andes mountain range).

She is 22 years old and unmarried.  She studied a technical career in computer science in one of the most prestigious institutes in Cusco.  Christa now works in a private company that sends and receives parcels, where she is a typist who inputs data to their software.  She has been working at the company for six months, and it is going very well.

Christa and her sister, Milagros, are going to open a small business that sells chicken.  She already has everything needed to operate the business, but requires only the money to rent the premises.  Christa's dream is to open another business that sells paint.

Christa is part of the group "Emprendedores" ("Entrepreneurs"), which is comprised of 12 partners that live in the city of Cusco, in the province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: To rent a premises for her small business.

loans.name: Andrea Clemencia

texts.es:
Andrea Clemencia tiene 40 años es casada vive con el esposo y con los  hijos de 8 y 13 años. Vive en el Recinto América  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto América, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Andrea  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 5 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es tener una casa propia.

En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y dedicarse a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Andrea Clemencia, 40 years old and married, lives with her husband and children who are 8 and 13.  She lives in the America neighborhood in the Ventanas canton.  The communal bank United We Win is located in the America neighborhood, belonging to the Ventanas canton, and is dedicated to short-cycle farming corn and rice. 

Andrea has worked sowing corn for 5 years.  She buys products in Ventanas and sells them at the market.

She requests the loan to buy seeds and fertilizers to sow corn and rice.  The loan will help increase income for the family’s use and investments.  Her dream is to own her own home.  

In her free time, Andrew likes to rest and focus on her children.

loans.use: buy seeds and fertilizer to sow corn and rice.

Carlos  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 20 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Carlos Segundo is 42 years old and single.  He lives with his parents in the América district, in the Ventanas canton.

The communal bank "UNIDOS VENCEREMOS" ["United We Will Overcome"] is located in the América district, which is part of the Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Carlos has been working in agriculture growing corn for the last twenty years. He purchases her supplies in Ventanas, and sells his products in the the market there.

The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. The loan will help him to increase her income for use by his family and for investment. His dream is to buy a plot of land so he can have his own home.

In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto América, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Celso  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 10 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  tener una casa.

Celso David is 31 years old and single.  He lives with his parents, and does not have children.  He lives in the América district in the Ventanas canton.

The communal bank "UNIDOS VENCEREMOS" ["United We Will Overcome"] is located in the América district, which is part of the Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Celso has been working in agriculture growing corn for the last ten years.  He purchases her supplies in Ventanas, and sells his products in the the market there.

The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. The loan will help him to increase her income for use by his family and for investment.  His dream is to have a house.

He enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loans.name: Miselida

texts.es: Miselida, de 60 años, es una mujer buena, amable y sobre todo muy trabajadora, esta separada del que fue su conviviente por muchos años y con quien tuvo cuatro hijos quienes ya son mayores e independientes. Solo su hija Diana de 25 años vive a su lado en su casa propia que pudo comprar con bastante esfuerzo. El trabajo de Miselida consiste en la venta de comida, desde muy temprano comienza cocinando sus ricos salchipollos (Plato hecho a base de pollo frito y papas fritas) y hamburguesas. Ella disfruta mucho de cocinar y lo hace con mucha habilidad, su comida es comprada por muchos clientes, los cuales acaban con los deliciosos platillos en unos segundos. Desde que comenzó a trabajar en esta actividad tuvo un proceso muy largo para poder consolidarse y poder creer como lo hizo hasta ahora, y lo logró y está muy contenta por eso. Para el futuro espera tener un restaurante, donde pueda vender todo el día y con mayor tranquilidad la comida que prepara, porque actualmente solo lo hace por la noches. Aunque tiene 8 años de experiencia en esta actividad, todavía le sigue siendo difícil atender a todos los clientes que tiene. Con todo el esfuerzo que realiza espera poder salir adelante y mejorar su vida. Este será el crédito número 9 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para poder continuar aumentando su capital de trabajo, además esta convencida que seguirá siendo la socia buena y responsable de los créditos obtenidos anteriormente. Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, comprará ingredientes, insumos y instrumentos de cocina para preparar sus diferentes platos con los que tiene muy contento a sus comensales.
texts.en:
Miselida, aged 60, is a good woman who is friendly and above all hard-working.  She is separated from the man who was her live-in partner for many years, and with whom she has four children who are fully grown and financially independent.  Only her daughter Diana, aged 25, lives alongside her in her own home, which she was able to buy with a significant amount of effort.

Miselida's work consists of selling food.  She starts cooking her delicious salchipollos (a dish made from fried chicken and french fries) and hamburgers very early in the morning.  She very much enjoys cooking and does it with much skill.  Her food is purchased by many customers, who end up with their delicious dishes within a few seconds.

Since she started working in this activity, it has been a very big process to get things up and running, and to believe in how things have worked up to now. She has achieved this, and is very happy about it.

In the future, she hopes to have a restaurant where she call sell her food throughout the day and with more ease, because currently she only sells at night-time.

While she has eight years of experience in this activity, she still finds it difficult to serve all her customers.  With all the effort that she puts in, she hopes to be able to move ahead and improve her life.

This will be her ninth loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial support to be able to continue growing her working capital.  In addition, she is convinced that she will continue to be a good member of the bank, and responsible as with the previously obtained loans.

With the 3,000 soles requested, she will purchase ingredients, supplies, and kitchen tools for preparing the different dishes which make her customers happy.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and non-perishable items for preparing her dishes.

loans.name: Pablo Boanerges

texts.es:
Pablo Boanerges tiene 46 años es casado vive con la esposa  y con los hijos de 15 y 18 años. Vive en el Recinto América  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto América, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Pablo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 30 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  comprar un terreno.

En el tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión y hacer deporte.

Pablo Boanerges is 46 years old, married and lives with his wife and children who are 15 and 18. He lives in the América township in the canton of Ventanas.

The communal bank "Unidos Venceremos" [Together We Win] is located in the América township belonging to the Ventanas canton. This bank is dedicated to short-cycle farming, growing corn and rice.

Pablo has devoted himself to growing corn for 30 years. He purchases his supplies in Ventanas and sells his crops in the market there as well. 

The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizer for growing corn and rice. The loan has allowed him to increase his earnings for family consumption and for investment. His dream is to have his own plot of land. 

In his free time he likes to watch television and play sports.

loans.name: Angel Ilario

texts.es:
Ángel Ilario tiene 44 años es casado, vive con la esposa  y sus tres de  hijos de 20, 17 y 13 años.  Vive en el Recinto América  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto América, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.
Ángel  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 16 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  tener un terreno para seguir invirtiendo.

En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Angel Ilario is 44 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and his three children, ages 20, 17, and 13. He lives in Recinto America in the Canton of Ventanas.

The group UNIDOS VENCEREMOS ("Together we will Overcome") is located in Recinto  America, in the Canton of Ventanas. The group works in the agricultural sector, specifically in the short-cycle harvest of corn and rice.

Angel has been working growing corn for 16 years. He buys his products in Ventanas and sells them in the market there.

He is applying for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer to sow his corn and rice. The loan will help him to increase his income to help his family and also to reinvest. His dream is to have property in order to continue investing.

In his free time, Angel likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for his corn and rice crops.

loans.name: Celestino

texts.es: El Sr. Celestino, es una persona emprendedora a  la  cual  le  gusta el comercio, es por  ello  que  tiene una tienda de abarrotes que poco a poco a crecido notablemente y debido a la demanda de sus clientes a optado por construir  un  cuarto  mas  grande  en el  cual  continuara  con su  negocio, es por  ello  que requiere  de nuestra  ayuda para  realizar su proyecto,ve  en el  crédito la posibilidad  de  ofrecer a sus  clientes  mayor  comodidad  cuando  lo  visitan  así  como  también le  permitirá  generar mayores  ingresos.
texts.en: Celestino is a very motivated person who likes business, and because of this, he has a general store that has been growing little by little. Due to the high demand from his clients, Celestino has decided to build a larger room in which he can continue his business. He needs our help to finish the project, and he sees in credit the possibility to offer his clients a more comfortable and convenient experience when they visit him, and in this way, it will allow him to generate more income.

loans.use: to build a larger space for his business.

loans.name: Fanny Patricia

texts.es:
Fanny Patricia tiene 32 años vive en unión libre, vive con el compañero  y sus dos hijos de 10 y 8 años.  Vive en el Recinto América  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto América, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.
Fanny  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 3 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  tener un terreno para seguir invirtiendo.

En el tiempo libre le gusta mucho ver televisión y dedicarse a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Fanny Patricia is 32 years old. She lives with her domestic partner and their two children, ages 10 and 8.She lives in Recinto America in the Canton of Ventanas.

The group UNIDOS VENCEREMOS ("Together we will Overcome") is located in Recinto America, in the Canton of Ventanas. The group works in the agricultural sector, specifically in the short-cycle harvest of corn and rice.

Fanny has been working growing corn for 3 years. She buys her products in Ventanas and sells them in the market there.

She is applying for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer to sow her corn and rice. The loan will help her to increase her income to help her family and also to reinvest. Her dream is to have property in order to continue investing.

In her free time, Fanny likes to watch television and spend time with her children.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer for her corn and rice crops.

loans.name: Fausto Lenin

texts.es:
Fausto Lenin tiene 18 años es soltero, vive con los padres no tiene hijos.  Vive en el Recinto América  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto América, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Fausto  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace 3 años. Compra y vende los productos en Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y  arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  tener un terreno y un vehículo para transportar sus productos.

Le gusta mucho ver televisión y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Fausto Lenin is 18 years old. He is single, and he lives with his parents. He does not have any children. He lives in Recinto America in the Canton of Ventanas.

The group UNIDOS VENCEREMOS ("Together we will Overcome") is located in Recinto America, in the Canton of Ventanas. The group works in the agricultural sector, specifically in the short-cycle harvest of corn and rice.

Fausto has been working growing corn for 3 years. He buys and sells his products in Ventanas.

He is applying for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer to sow his corn and rice. The loan will help him to increase his income to help his family and also to reinvest. His dream is to have property and a vehicle to transport his products.

Fausto likes to watch television and play sports.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for corn and rice crops.

loans.name: Las Hormiguitas Group

texts.es:
La alcancía Comunal “Las Hormiguitas” es un grupo unido que está conformado por 09 socios entre hombres y mujeres la cual lleva trabajando 08 Meses  con Edaprospo. 
La Sra. Julia tiene 50 años de edad es casada y tiene 04 hijos la cual sigue apoyando a 01 de ellos, ya que está en etapa escolar, en la fotografía se ubicada a lado derecho, ella viste una blusa color fucsia y tiene el cabello corto, esta al costado de la señora que viste un polo negro y pantalón rojo. 
Hace más de 25 años que la Sra. Julia se dedica a la venta de comida, en un local alquilado, gracias a su negocio la Sra. Julia ha podido mejorar su calidad de vida.
Con el fin de mejorar su negocio solicito el crédito para la compra de mesas, cubiertos y un horno microonda y de esta manera brindarles una mejor atención a sus clientes.
La Sra. Rosa no pudo estar presente en el desembolso por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
The community bank "Las Hormiguitas" ("The Little Ants") is a united group made up of nine members, both men and women, who have been working with the Programa Prosperidad ("Prosperity Program") for eight months. Julia is 50 years old and married with four children, one of whom she continues to support, as he is stil in school. In the photo she is on the right hand side in a fuschia blouse and with short hair; she is at the side of the woman in the black shirt and red pants. 

For more than 25 years, Julia has worked selling food from a rented spaces. Thanks to her business, Julia has been able to improve her living space, and she is now buying her own property. Julia's wish is to finish the construction of her home. WIth the goal of improving her business, she is applying for a loan to buy tables, silverware, and a microwave, and in this way, provide her customers with a better experience. The "Las Hormiguitas" community bank are thankful for and dedicated to their working relationship with the Programa Prosperidad. For work-related reasons, Rosa, one member of the group, was not able to be present for the initial distribution of capital (when the photo was taken).

loans.use: para la compra de mesas, cubiertos y un horno microonda.

loans.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es:
Mario Alberto  tiene 37 años de edad, él vive en Ica ,ciudad caracterizada actualmente por el incremento de inversión, no solo en la agroexportaciones, es decir en los fundos, si no también, en la apertura de nuevos centros comerciales que brindan muchos puestos de trabajo a pobladores iqueños.  En su tiempo libre disfruta construir casas;  como bien se sabe el Perú se caracteriza por tener las comidas más deliciosas del mundo y uno de los platos que a Mario Alberto le agrada es “Carapulcra con sopa seca”.  Mario Alberto estudió hasta quinto año de secundaria y le hubiera gustado estudiar Medicina Veterinaria. El es conviviente y su pareja es ama de casa, juntos tienen 2 hijos el menor de sus hijos tiene 3 años va a un centro educativo inicial, y su otro hijo tiene 17 años el cual cursa el quinto año de secundaria.
	
El es Maestro constructor dedicado a su trabajo de manera eficiente y responsable, trabaja aproximadamente 9 horas diarias, sus amigos lo entusiasmaron para que trabaje en este tipo de negocio ya que debido al terremoto del año 2007 aumento la necesidad de contar con maestros constructores. En un día puede atender a un cliente  debido a lo complejo de la labor y esto le permite ganar aproximadamente un promedio de S/52 diarios y en un buen día puede ganar S/100 soles lo que le ayuda en algunos gastos adicionales del hogar, su negocio tiene éxito porque realiza su labor de manera responsable y con honradez y con ello muchas personas comentan lo buena de su labor y recomiendan su trabajo. Actualmente desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarlo para poder comprar más herramientas y con ello brindar un mejor servicio  y no tener la necesidad de alquilar las herramientas necesarias, Mario Alberto desea poder pagar en 6 meses el total de su crédito.

Esta mejora podrá ayudarle en su labor diaria con herramientas en buen estado y con ello aumentar los ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y así poder ahorrar el dinero suficiente para tener una empresa avícola lo que lo ayudará a cumplir su gran sueño: “Tener su propia empresa de construcción."
texts.en:
Mario Alberto is 37 years old. He lives in Ica, a city that has recently had a large increase in investment, not only in agricultural exports - in other words, large farms - but also in the opening of new commercial centers that bring many jobs to regular citizens of Ica. In his free time, Mario Alberto enjoys building houses. Peru is well known for having some of the most delicious foods int he world, and one of the dishes that Mario Alberto enjoys is "carapulcra con sopa seca" (a combination of a pasta dish and a beef or pork stew that are often served together). Mario Alberto studied until the fifth year of secondary school, and he would have liked to have studied veterinary medicine. He lives with his partner, who is the head of the household, and they have two children together. The younger child is three years old and attends an early education center; the older child is 17 years old, and he is in the fifth year of secondary school.

Mario Alberto is a master construction worker, always working efficiently and responsibly. He works about nine hours a day. His friends encouraged him to go into this type of work, and because of the earthquake in 2007, the need for skilled construction workers has increased.In one day, he can attend to one client, and because of the complexity of the labor involved, he is able to earn an average of 52 soles (roughly 20 USD); on a good day, he could early 100 soles (roughly 38 USD), which helps him with a few additional household expenses. His business is successful because he does his work in a responsible and honorable way, and because of this, many people comment on his good work and recommend him to others. Now, Mario Alberto hopes that Kiva lenders can help him to be able to buy more tools, and with these tools offer better service and not have to rent necessary tools. Mario Alberto will repay the loan in six months.

This improvement of having good tools will help him in his daily work, and in this way, he will be able to increase his income to improve his family's quality of life. He would also have enough money to start a poultry business, which would help him accomplish his long-term goal: to have his own construction company.

loans.use: to purchase construction tools.

loans.name: Adriana Maria

texts.es: La señora Adriana Maria a sus 48 años de edad laboró en un restaurante de una amiga por varios años hasta que su jefe le brindo la oportunidad de trabajar como independiente y es así como desde hace cuatro años inicio con su propio negocio de venta de productos cosméticos por catálogo. Actualmente y luego de mucho esfuerzo, la señora Adriana es líder de ventas y tiene a su cargo 120 mujeres cabeza de hogar que trabajan como vendedoras. Con el ánimo de seguir brindando una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo de 13 años, la señora Adriana necesita de la compra de productos cosméticos que le faciliten ofrecer a sus clientes crédito y así poder ahorrar para poder cumplir su sueño de tener su propio almacén y brindarle una buena educación a su hijo.
texts.en:
Adriana Maria is 48 years old. She worked in a friend's restaurant for several years until her boss gave her the opportunity to work independently. So, for years ago, Adriana started her own business selling cosmetic products through catalogs.

After a lot of hard work, Adriana is currently the leader of sales,and she has 120 women homemakers who work for her as salespeople. With the goal of continuing to offer a better quality of life to her 13-year-old son, Adriana is applying for this loan to buy cosmetic products to offer to her clients. This loan will help her save, and eventually, to reach her goals of having her own store and of providing her son with a good education.

loans.use: to purchase assorted cosmetics.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Rocío, de 49 años, es una mujer muy buena, amable y trabajadora, esta separada del que fue su conviviente por muchos años y con quien tuvo res hijas, de las cuales solo una es menor y aun depende de ella para poder tener educación y alimentación. Juntas viven en su casa propia y juntas trabajan mucho a diario para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Rocío consiste en la venta de golosinas y otros productos, y que son expuestos en un pequeño tablero frente a un parque muy transitado de su ciudad. Su negocio es muy concurrido por los niños, ya que siempre tiene cosas muy deliciosas para vender, además que tiene mucha paciencia para atenderlos, motivo por el cual casi siempre acaba con su mercadería. Además ella preparara algunas cosas más como maíz (pop corn) dulces y salado, lleva frutas y otros productos que las personas siempre desean comer. Esto lo hace ya que aprendió durante todo este tiempo, por lo que hay que tener mucha variedad que ofrecer a los clientes. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite decidir su horario de atención, lleva 2 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día en su puesto sin poder moverse. Espera con el tiempo juntar el dinero necesario, para poner una tienda de abarrotes. Este será el sexto préstamo con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 600 soles, comprará mas golosinas y grutas para así seguir ofreciendo sus productos en variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rocio is 49 years old. She is a good, friendly, and hardworking woman, separated from her partner of many years with whom she had three daughters. Only one of her daughters is still a minor and depending on Rocio for her education and care. They live in her house and work together every day to be able to have a better quality of life.

Rocio's works selling candy and other products, which are exhibited on a small table in front of a busy park in her city. Her business is very popular with children, as she always has delicious things to sell, and also because she has a lot of patience for serving children. She almost always sells out of her merchandise. In addition to candy, Rocio prepares things like sweet and salty popcorn, and she brings fruit and other products that people always want to eat. She does this because what she has learned during this time is that one should always have a lot of variety to offer to customers.

What Rocio likes most about her work is that it allows her to decide her own schedule. She has been doing this for two years, and she thinks the most difficult part is to stay in one place all day without moving. She hopes that in time she will be able to put together the necessary money to put in a general store. 

This will be her sixth loan with MFP, and she is looking forward to the collaboration that will help her continue working toward her goals. She is also determined to make her payments on time, as she did with her past loans. In addition, Rocio is grateful for being part of the communal bank, because all of its members are very responsible and supportive. With the requested amount of 600 soles (~230 USD), she will buy more candy and fruit to continue offering a variety of products to her clients.

loans.use: to buy candy and fruit.

loans.name: San Juan Group

texts.es:
El comité de Mujeres de nombre San Juan se conformó con 12 integrantes, todas ellas trabajan en forma conjunta y solidaria para comenzar a trabajar con el programa de Comités de Mujeres Emprendedoras. Ellas tienen como objetivo crecer, no solo en lo económico, sino también en lo personal.
Una historia muy conmovedora la de la Sra. Avelina que es una señora que siempre tuvo ganas de incursionar en el tema de venta de ropas y ahora pudo cumplir su sueño comercial gracias al programa de la Fundación Paraguaya, ya que recibió la ayuda y sumado a sus ganas de salir adelante podrá progresar y salir adelante.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas, con las cuales podrá abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en:
The San Juan Women's Committee is made up of 12 members, and all of them work together and support each other to start working with the Women Entrepreneur Committees Program. Their goal is to grow not only economically, but also personally.

The very moving story of Avelina, one member of the group, is that she always wanted to get into selling clothing, and she is now, thanks to the funding received from the Fundacion Paraguaya program and the motivation it gave her to work hard, she is able to accomplish her commercial dream.

She is applying for a loan to buy clothing, with which she will be able to stock up and keep up with her clients' demand. She is thankful to the foundation and to Kiva for the opportunity that they have given her.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for resale.

loans.name: Monica

texts.es: Mónica, de 34 años, es una mujer buena y amable, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene tres hijos quienes aún son menores y depende de ella y su pareja para poder tener una buena educación y brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Viven en una casa propia como una familia muy unida y trabajadora. El trabajo de Mónica, consiste en la venta de golosinas. Su puesto está ubicado en su propia casa, negocio que es muy concurrido por sus clientes. Recuerda cuando se inicio y cuales fueron los motivos que le llevaron a entrar a este negocio, ya que necesita ser independiente en algunos gastos, además de tener que aportar a la economía del hogar. Con el tiempo se decidió y ahora vende bien y esta muy contenta. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y hacerlos reír. Lleva 3 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que vender bajo los fuertes rayos solares de la mañana, le encantaría tener una tienda de golosinas donde pueda vender con más comodidad y ofrecer otros tipos de productos a sus clientes. Este será el crédito número 4 con MFP, por tanto esta muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su negocio. Además esta muy comprometido una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, está contento de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos sus integrantes son responsables y muy buenos entre ellos. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará mas productos de golosinas para ofrecer a sus clientes, además con la venta de productos de primera necesidad.
texts.en:
Monica, 34 years old, is a good and friendly woman. She lives with her partner, with whom she has three children who are all still young and dependent on her and her partner for a good education and a better quality of life. They live in their own house as a very united and hardworking family. Monica works selling candy from her own home, which is a very popular business. She remembers that when she started, her motives for beginning the business were that she needed to be independent with some expenses, and she also wanted to be able to support her household's finances. With time, she decided on this business, and now her candy is selling well, and she is very happy. 

What Monica likes best about her work is talking with her customers and making them laugh. She has been doing this work for three years, and she thinks the most difficult part is having to sell under the strong sun in the morning. She would love to have a candy shop where she could sell her products with more comfort, and offer other types of products to her clients. 

This will her fourth loan with MFP, and she is very happy to know that she has financial support, because with this support she feels safe to expand her business. In addition, she is very committed to complete her repayments on time, as she has done in the past, and she happy to belong to her community bank, because all the members are very responsible and good to each other. With the amount requested of 1000 soles, she will buy more candy to offer to her clients, as well as some essential food items to sell.

loans.use: to buy necessary food products and candy.

loans.name: Vanesa
