In the photograph, provided by Esperanza's sister, she is seated, wearing a red vest.

loans.use: to buy blankets

loans.name: Felipe Francisco

texts.es:
Felipe Francisco   tiene 46 años vive en Unión Libre, y vive con su cónyuge  y con los hijos. Vive en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla el recreo  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz, fréjol y soya criar gallinas.

Felipe se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol, a criar gallinas. Desde hace ocho años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos para la maleza  para la siembra del maíz, así también para la compra de la comida apropiada para criar sus gallinas. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueño es poder comprar un terreno  y así poder  tener mayor ingresos  para su familia.

En los tiempos libres me gusta jugar indor, pasar  con su familia.
texts.en:
Felipe Francisco is 46 years old and lives with his spouse and his children.  He lives in the San Vicente las Lomas area of the Ventanas canton.

The V.C.R. El Recreo is in San Vicente las Lomas, part of the Ventanas canton, and is composed of members dedicated to farming corn, rice, beans and soy beans and the raising of chickens.

Felipe grows corn and beans and raises chickens, he has been doing this for eight years.  He buys his products in Ventanas and sells his production in the market of the same location.

The requested loan is for the purchase of supplies, fertilizers, weed killers for the planting of corn.  He is also buying feed for his chickens.  The loan helps him to increase his income for the use of his family.  His dream is to buy land and be able to generate more income for his family.

In his free time he likes to be with his family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, fertilizers, weed killers for the planting of corn, and also to buy feed for the chickens.

loans.name: Margarita's Group

texts.es:
Margarita's group es un grupo de tres mujeres responsables por sus familias y trabajo, en este grupo la presidenta es Margarita ya que es una mujer fuerte, muy luchadora, proactiva, amable además le gusta mejorar cada día su estilo de vida. Margarita es madre de familia, vive con su esposo y cuatro hijos en la ciudad de Cayambe que se encuentra a media hora de Otavalo.

Margarita tiene una tienda, en la cual trabaja su familia ya que es la única fuente de ingreso de su familia para sustentar sus gastos. Es la primera vez que realiza un crpedito en Fodemi, este crédito va a ser invertido en la compra de productos variados para su tienda ya que en la temporada de navidad incrementan las ventas y los ingresos es por eso que quiere qprovechar ya que directamente beneficiará a su familia mejorando su calidad de vida.

El sueño de Margarita es poder exportar productos y que sus hijos aprendan del negocio ya que les puede generar buenas utilidades.
texts.en:
Margarita's Group is a group of three women responsible for their families and work.  Margarita is the president of this group because she is a strong woman, very much a fighter, proactive, kind.  She also likes to improve her lifestyle every day.  Margarita is the mother of a family.  She lives with her husband and four children in the city of Cayambe, which is located a half hour from Otavalo.

Margarita has a store in which her family works because it is the only source of family income to support their expenses.  This is the first time she is getting a loan from FODEMI.  This loan will be invested in buying various products for her store because during the Christmas season sales and income go up.  This is why she wants to take advantage, because it will directly benefit her family, improving their quality of life.

Margarita's dream is to be able to export products and for her children to learn the business since it can generate good profits for them.

loans.use: to supply her store with various products to get good Christmas sales.
